name: Ambrosia Bar and Restaurant
homepage_content: Ambrosia Bar and Restaurant | Exquisite Dining & Takeaway in Auckland | Unforgettable Culinary Experience Welcome To Ambrosia Bar and Restaurant 44 Third View Avenue, Beachlands 2018, New Zealand Order Online Welcome To Ambrosia Bar and Restaurant 44 Third View Avenue, Beachlands 2018, New Zealand Order Online About Ambrosia Bar and Restaurant Ambrosia Bar and Restaurant, situated at 44 Third View Avenue in Beachlands, Auckland 2018, New Zealand, is a cherished local establishment renowned for its authentic modern European cuisine. Serving patrons throughout the day, Ambrosia offers an all-day breakfast, lunch, and dinner menu, making it an ideal spot for any meal. The restaurant prides itself on crafting quality dishes from scratch, utilizing freshly available ingredients. Diners can expect premium cuts of meat, fresh seafood, and locally sourced produce, all prepared by an experienced chef with over 20 years in the hospitality industry. Complementing the exquisite food, Ambrosia features a fully licensed in-house bar, offering a wide selection of wines, spirits, liqueurs, and expertly crafted cocktails. The warm and inviting atmosphere, combined with attentive service, has made Ambrosia a popular gathering place for locals and visitors alike. Whether you're meeting friends for coffee and cake or enjoying a full meal with a cold drink, Ambrosia Bar and Restaurant provides a fantastic setting for any occasion. Good restaurant, delicious food, classy atmosphere We can't say enough good things about this restaurant. We ate there more than any other place in Beachlands. Food was always great. Nice atmosphere and friendly staff. We travel the world full time and this place had some of the best Lamb Rogan Josh I've ever had. My wife loved the Salmon Risotto dish as well. As you can see by the pics, we ate there a few times. Well worth the visit if you're hungry and in the area. Sizzlemann Good restaurant, delicious food, classy atmosphere Dinner last night and the food was lovely. Staff were friendly and chatty, food came out pretty quickly and they sang Happy Birthday to Mum with a candle in her dessert! Thank you, she (we) had a great evening. Sonya Jenks Good restaurant, delicious food, classy atmosphere My birthday lunch location. Staff went above and beyond especially with my birthday cupcake (pictured). Such a variety of options to choose from. Everything tasted fresh and amazing. Really grateful blessed it was at Ambrosia Beachlands. I had the best experience. Definitely will be returning. Amici Italian Cafe and Restaurant Nestled in the heart of Whangarei, down bustling Quality Street, Amici is a charming eatery serving an extensive Italian menu to cater for all throughout brunch, lunch, dinner, Pizzeria and dessert When does a restaurant become more than just a place to just get something to eat? When does eating out become a great experience? At Amiciâs, we strive to be YOUR favourite Local authentic Italian restaurant. Food is at the heart of our mission. From the Italian classics, to our one-of-a-kind spiced Italian favourites, all of our offerings are handcrafted from the finest, freshest ingredients available. Whether youâre craving Italian comfort food like our Ravioli, Pappardelle or something with a little more spice like our signature Fettuccine Carbonara, Amiciâs has something for everyone. We revere the tradition of serving only the best, and when it means coming in early to hand-roll the meatballs, build a layered Lasagna one layer at a time, or craft our tiramisu from scratch, we think of it as passion, not work. And while we are most proud of the Italian classics, itâs our one-of-a-kind, signature spicy dishes that really get us excited! A little something we call Spiced Italian. Our Pastas, Gourmet Pizzas, and pizza Garlic Bread have been some of our more popular dishes since we first opened our doors. So whether you love the classics, or the spice, it will always be fresh and handmade to order at Amici plus we have a range of desserts, nibble or simply a casual wine or coffee, â Amici will happily welcome you. With an expansive terrace, featuring a classic tranquil fountain, and a warm interior with a cozy fireplace, the restaurant is suitable rain or shine â all year round. We also cater for Gluten free, Vegan, Dairy free. Good amount to of parking outside, easy to find just off the strand. Nice big, clean shop with seating for takeaway, lounging or dining in. Friendly and fast service. Roast meals, meat rolls, sandwiches and burgers available. Red onion on the meat sandwich was delicious!!! Decent prices. Sharon W I really appreciate the pride the young guy at Deli Roast takes in his work. He carefully crafts each burger and meal with fresh ingredients and ensures everything is packaged neatly. You can tell he takes the time to make sure everything is evenly applied, not sloppily thrown together like at a large chain drive-thru. The value for money and service is fantastic. There’s also a nice area for customers to sit and eat, which is always clean and tidy, with a TV on. It’s a great spot for elderly customers who enjoy sitting down for lunch or an early dinner. I’m becoming a regular for their takeaway pork burger with crackling on the side, nice quick lunch for a working person – absolutely delicious! It has to be fried in oil on medium heat to get the best taste for your curry. There are so many indian dishes where curry leave a vital ingredient and cannot be missed to get dish right. At Curry Leaf restaurant, we offer many amazing food items which has this real autentic taste, so head to Pukekohe to enjoy the decilious curries or just order online and eat at your place. name: Fern Lodge Inglewood
homepage_content: Fernlodge Inglewood - Hotel in Inglewood Fernlodge Inglewood 🌎 40 Matai Street, 4330 Inglewood, New Zealand Book a room Arrival Departure Adults 1 2 3 4 5 6 Children 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 Check Availability Featuring a bar, Fernlodge Inglewood is located in Inglewood in the Taranaki region, 20 km from Yarrow Stadium and 18 km from Brooklands Zoo. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 18 km from TSB Stadium. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette and a dining area. At Fernlodge Inglewood every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. You can play billiards and darts at the accommodation. Pukekura Park is 18 km from Fernlodge Inglewood, while Puke Ariki is 19 km away. The nearest airport is New Plymouth Airport, 20 km from the hotel. homepage_content: Fu Lin Kitchen | Henderson | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Fu Lin Kitchen PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Fu Lin Kitchen Order Online from Fu Lin Kitchen Asian & Chinese Cuisine * 361 Great N Rd Henderson, Auckland 0612 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Meats With Vegetable Fried Egg Noodles（菜远炒面） $17.00 Pork & Chinese Chives Dumplings 15 Pcs $17.00 TOP SELLERS Meats With Vegetable Fried Egg Noodles（菜远炒面） $17.00 Pork & Chinese Chives Dumplings 15 Pcs $17.00 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed Closed Friday Closed Closed Saturday Closed Closed Sunday Closed Closed Monday Closed Closed Tuesday Closed Closed Wednesday Closed Closed REVIEWS I recently ordered the Kung Pao Chicken and Eggplant with Chicken. While the flavors were decent, the dishes left much to be desired. Both were overwhelmingly vegetable-heavy with very few pieces of chicken, which was disappointing. It felt like the portions reflected cost-cutting measures, prioritizing vegetables over protein. Overall, an okay meal. It was affordable. Elroy Okada My sister and I decided to try Fu Lin Kitchen on a whim, we arrived 30 minutes before closing time but the lovely woman let us order what we wanted and the food arrived promptly. I had the beef brisket on rice and cucumber salad, while my sisters had sweet and sour chicken on rice and lemon chicken on rice. We all thoroughly enjoyed our meals, including my two year old who shared my beef brisket on rice with me. Cooked to perfection. Would definitely come back here again. Helena Fonoti Filipo I decided to try a new restaurant last night but can home somewhat disappointed. I believe the NEW OWNERS should work a little more with the quality and taste of the food. Most came out tasteless. Our Dry Hor Fun had nothing but broken rice noodle bits. The Wonton soup didn't have much flavor and was pretty blend. This restaurant was was really good a year back... Michael Lachica August 2023/ Now under new ownership, still very acceptable, Saturday lunch was steady with 3-4 tables. 1/ Usually do takeout, but today, decided to do lunch, all very pleasant, away from the hustle and bustle of Westcity, but still just a pedestrian crossing away, most enjoyable. 2/ Drop in for dinner, didn’t disappoint as per photo. 3/ Saturday night dinner, steady patronage, a very nice enjoyable meal for two. 4/ another visit for Saturday lunch, under new ownership, standards are still high. cee doubleyou There's a lot of under rated Chinese places around and this is one of them. Anyone saying this place is grubby and needs their plates replaced obviously haven't been to Asia. The place is tidy and neat and has a good food safety rating, that is all you need. Other than that you would come here for the food. Chef here is consistent, and the place is run by a family. Expect hearing Cantonese because hey, you're at a Chinese restaurant. And do expect good range of tofu, duck, seafood dishes. Lunch is very cheap! So suggest going here than your local takeaways. Very generous with their veges and the choice of fish is Hāpuka! The staff are friendly and always can recommend a good eat. Odyssey L PREV NEXT LOCATION × Average Customer Rating 4.2 I recently ordered the Kung Pao Chicken and Eggplant with Chicken. name: KaikÅura TOP 10 Holiday Park
homepage_content: Kaikōura TOP 10 Holiday Park Welcome to Kaikōura TOP 10 Discover Kaikōura, a coastal town famed for wildlife and scenery. Kaikōura TOP 10 Holiday Park is the perfect base to enjoy this breathtaking nature paradise. Previous Next Location Kaikōura is situated in the northern part of Canterbury in New Zealand’s South Island. Apart from its majestic scenery, Kaikōura is popular with nature lovers who flock to the town for its unique animal encounters. Our TOP 10 holiday park is centrally located so you can easily discover all that Kaikōura has to offer. Kaikōura TOP 10 Holiday Park is situated on the main road of town just across from the beach. The town with its lovely shops and restaurants are an easy walk away and many of the iconic tours and attractions are within easy reach. Picton – 2 hours Marlborough – 2 hours Christchurch – 2 hours 20 min Nelson – 3 hour 20 min Kaikōura TOP 10 Accommodation Whatever your budget, Kaikōura TOP 10 Holiday Park offers an excellent range of accommodation options for every type of traveller. Choose from our range of camping sites, motels or units and cabins. View Accommodation Options Offers Stay 2, Save 25% Save 25% when you book a 2–7 night stay at Ōhope Beach, Kaikōura or Carters Beach TOP 10 Holiday Park, for travel between now and the end of November. Learn More Book Now Facilities Swimming Pool Our heated swimming pool is open from October to April, 8:30am–7:30pm (or until dusk). Games Room & Movie Room Challenge family or friends to a game of foosball or table tennis, then wind down with a family movie night. Jumping Pillow Always a hit with the kids, the giant jumping pillow is the perfect place to bounce, laugh, and burn off energy. Adventure Playground With swings, climbing frames and more, the adventure playground provides entertainment for younger guests. Private Spa Unwind in one of our private hot tubs, the ideal way to relax after a day exploring Kaikōura’s coast and wildlife. Conference Facilities Host your next conference in our modern space, equipped with a projector, TV screen and flexible seating options. Features Pedal Cart & Bicycle Hire Covered BBQ Terrace Dump Station Bathroom Facilities Kitchen Facilities Laundry Facilities Conference Facilities Tour Booking Desk Free WiFi Park Map Check pricing & availability Kaikōura Attractions Whale Watching Take part in New Zealand's ultimate marine experience & amaze in wonder at the giants of the sea - the sperm whale. Save $30 with a TOP 10 Club Membership. Peninsula Walk Walk the breathtaking peninsula walk, with clifftop vistas from sea to snow-capped peaks. You'll discover why this is the most-walked short walk in New Zealand. Dolphin Encounter A once in a lifetime trip to watch or swim with the playful, acrobatic dusky dolphins in their natural environment. Save $16 - $34 with a TOP 10 Club Membership. Albatross Encounter Kaikōura is the Albatross capital of the world. Take a trip to visit up to 14 different species throughout the year. Save $23 with a TOP 10 Club Membership. Kaikōura Kayaks Enjoy Kaikōura by kayak. There are chances of viewing dolphins, seals and many species of seabirds. Save 10% with a TOP 10 Club Membership. Seal Swimming A breathtaking activity with Seal Swim Kaikōura. You won't believe how curious and playful New Zealand fur seals can be. Save $22 with a TOP 10 Club Membership. Charter Fishing Tours Pick one of Kaikōura's many charter operators, Have fun fishing for Blue Cod, Groper, Hapuka, and enjoy the spoils of the day. Indulge in Seafood Kaikōura is renowned as the crayfish capital of New Zealand. Indulge in other fresh delicacies including groper and cod. Mountain Biking Kaikoura offers a variety of spectacular mountain bike trails to explore. Tracks range from casual family trails to challenging adventures. Testimonials “The staff/owners make you very welcome on arrival and the cleanliness and presentation of the camp is perfect. We will definitely be staying there again. Central location so can walk or cycle to your favourite cafe/bar.” Gina Kaikōura TOP 10 Holiday Park “Stayed for one night in a family kitchen cabin. We were impressed. All linen was provided, and we were definitely warm enough, especially with a good heater. Beds were comfortable, and cabin was clean and smelled fresh.” Lee Kaikōura TOP 10 Holiday Park Book Now Frequently Asked Questions What are your reception hours? Our current reception hours are 8.00am – 8.30pm. If you know you will be arriving after hours, please let us know. What time is check in/check out? Check in is from 2pm, check out by 10am. If you require an early check in or a late check out, please contact Reception and we will do our best to accommodate you. What happens if I need to check in after-hours? If you know you will be arriving after hours, please let us know. We can then talk you through our late arrival procedure. What is your pet policy? We are pet friendly. Pets must be kept on a lead at all times, they must not be left on their own and you must clean up after them. Is Wi-Fi available? Yes, we have free, unlimited Wi-Fi for guests. What is available in the kitchen? The kitchens are fully equipped with ovens, hobs, microwaves, toasters, hot water zip and fridge freezers. It has indoor seating and tv’s. Please note, cookware and crockery are not provided but kitchen sets can be hired at reception. Are there laundry facilities? Yes, we have a laundry room with tap and go washing machine and dryers. Laundry powder is available for purchase at reception for $2.50 per sachet. Is linen available? Yes, all linen is provided in our rooms. For our cabins, towels are available for hire from reception. Do you have accessible accommodation options available? Yes, we offer two specialised accessible accommodation options for guests who need them. Please contact our friendly staff for more information and to check availability on +64 3 319 5362 . Get in Touch Call : + 64 3 319 5362 Follow us on Socials Address: Kaikōura TOP 10 Holiday Park, 34 Beach Road, Kaikoura 7300 Please use the form below to contact Kaikōura TOP 10. Chef Of India Papakura Chef Of India in Papakura, New Zealand, is a delightful dining establishment located at 7/1 Prictor Street. This restaurant is renowned for its authentic Indian cuisine, offering a wide range of dishes that cater to both vegetarian and non-vegetarian preferences. The menu at Chef Of India features a variety of classic Indian dishes, including aromatic curries, flavorful tandoori items, biryanis, and more. Whether you're a fan of rich and creamy butter chicken, spicy vindaloo, or a hearty vegetable biryani, there's something to satisfy every palate. Chef Of India in Papakura is known not only for its delicious food but also for its friendly and attentive service. It's an excellent choice for anyone looking to experience the flavors of India in the heart of Papakura. name: Golden Jade Seafood
homepage_content: Golden Jade Restaurant | Epsom | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Golden Jade Restaurant PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Golden Jade Restaurant Order Online from Golden Jade Restaurant Asian & Chinese Cuisine * 417 Manukau Rd Epsom, Auckland 1023 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS King Roast Duck $32.20 Three Combination of BBQ on Rice $20.70 TOP SELLERS King Roast Duck $32.20 Three Combination of BBQ on Rice $20.70 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 11am to 8:45pm Friday Closed 11am to 8:45pm Saturday Closed 11am to 8:45pm Sunday Closed Closed Monday Closed 11am to 8:45pm Tuesday Closed 11am to 8:45pm Wednesday Closed 11am to 8:45pm REVIEWS The food is good. Vegetarian options are available (pictured) but are not so obvious on the menu. We were seated quickly & our orders taken not long after. The food arrived promptly. I do feel like, as a non-Chinese person, you may struggle to communicate with the wait staff. If we didn't have someone with us to translate, I feel like it could have been problematic and our experience would have been different. I would go back with my Chinese friends. Bee You can't deny they have some most delicious Chinese style roasted ducks here. Very surprising to find this restaurant only obtained 3.9. I don't know what other people think, at least, it has been in the market for more than 2 decades, still strong as always, nothing impacted by the economy. Eric Chou奧克蘭寶哥 The food was as good as before. I haven’t been here in four years. The prices have increased a lot, and there’s no more free yummy soup, which is quite disappointing Leisure Life 休闲生活 I've visited this restaurant countless times and I can honestly say their food is consistently good. The prices are reasonable and the portions are generous. Plus, the flavors are just amazing. The staff is always friendly, making the experience even better. Parking can be a bit tricky but there’s plenty of street parking available. Augustine Tea PREV NEXT LOCATION × Average Customer Rating 3.9 The food is good. name: Hansan
homepage_content: Hansan New Market | Newmarket | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Hansan New Market Vietnamese - 4.1 55 Nuffield St, Newmarket, Auckland 1023 × Average Customer Rating 4.1 had dinner @ hansan Vietnamese pretty good. authentic dishes. appetizers quite ok- rice rolls, spring rolls, deepfried wanton. booncha and beef pho very good. the seafood fried noodles turned out pretty good too. sumin family joined. wenyu staying near ferry point so didn’t join. curry chicken and banh mi so so. 8.11.2025 chefquak This is one of my and my partner’s favorite Vietnamese restaurants. The food is always delicious and authentic, and the prices are very reasonable. Whether we're looking for a casual meal or a comforting dish, this place never disappoints. It’s our reliable go-to spot whenever we’re unsure of where to eat. Highly recommend it for great Vietnamese cuisine! Isabelle Qin Food was delicious and service was very quick. Quite large portions as well. Good atmosphere, clean and tidy Jack Chng We live in the West and have a Hansen in New Lynn as I was meeting my family tried the Newmarket branch, typical Hansen great food and service, the best Jack Fruit shakes and Thai pancakes, generous portions and fairly priced compared to many of there competitors. Thanks for such beautiful food. Keith German × × - + ADD 0 ATTENTION × Are you sure you want to place this order for tomorrow? homepage_content: Indian Gypsy Restaurant Henderson | Dine in and Takeaway Entree Mains Book Now Contact Us Indian Gypsy Restaurant Henderson Weâre all travellersâ¦ coming and going Some say you have to go back to go forward, so expect a flavour bomb on every plateâ¦ A culmination of genuine old fashioned cooking secrets and stylesâ¦ Born out of the best of fresh, local fare & a combo of well travelled spices from our farmer friends here and afar. name: Imperial Takeaways
homepage_content: Imperial Takeaways | Trentham | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Imperial Takeaways Chinese - Fish & Chips - 4.2 581 Fergusson Dr, Trentham, Upper Hutt 5018 × Average Customer Rating 4.2 Ordered the Lemon chicken with noodles and an egg burger ($24.50 for the lemon chicken, $7.20 for the burger) both were delicious the burger had alot of mayo and kinda average price pretty much the same as any other fish and chip shop Luke Smith Awesome 'Mom and Pup' Chinese TakeAway. Excellent food. Good portions. I had Dumplings, and they were large size and excellent quality. 👌 Sweet and Sour Pork fried rice was very good too. Meat was in good small chucks so no need to bite in half to take a bite. Note: Person that served me did not speak fluent English, so some patients required, but not an issue. Also the inside table sitting is only for 2 people, so TakeAway all the way. Alexei Borissenko I ordered Combo 2, which included 2 fish, chips, 2 hotdog, 2 nuggets and 2 potato fritter. The food was good overall, but I didn’t enjoy the fish, though the batter was still tasty. ANAND FRANCIS Imperial Takeaways has an extensive menu of Chinese takeaways which include many seafood type meals including deep fried Squid with chilli, rocksalt and onions. All meals are by number so try #16, 3, 83 and 87 they were great Graeme Wooller Excellent food, both in quality and variety. I've been a customer for over four years now. The menu is extensve and food is really nice. My favourites are crispy squid with spicy salt and sweet and sour fish. The couple that runs the shop are nice and friendly. Phone is answered promptly and they are opened till 11pm - great for us, night owls! S Cole × × - + ADD 0 ATTENTION × Are you sure you want to place this order for tomorrow? name: India Village Restaurant - Manly
homepage_content: India Village Restaurant Manly Whangaporoa | Takeaway Home Delivery and Dine in Entree Mains Book Now Contact Us India Village Restaurant Manly Whangaporoa Indian cuisine has been influenced greatly by the multitude of invaders throughout the countryâs history; the Mughals, Turks, Europeans, and Portuguese all left their mark. By adding their own cooking styles and ingredients, they provided a rich diversity, resulting in a unique cuisine. What holds this diverse cuisine together is the aromatic and flavourful spices. The art of Indian cooking is in blending the spices so that they are in perfect harmony in each dish.Northern Indian cooking is rich in meats, nuts, and amazing breads. The cuisine of western India is simpler, focusing on rice and lentils. The eastern coastline is blessed with abundant seafood, which is reflected in the cuisine of the region.Southern India is famous for its legendary pickles and chutneys.Indian cooking categorizes foods into six tastes â sweet, sour, salty, spicy, bitter, and astringent. A well-balanced Indian meal contains all six tastes. This is accomplished, in part, by accompanying the dishes with a wide variety of condiments.India village try to deliver all these tastes to its customers as the chefâs working here are well experienced. Owner is the sweetest Art Rheyzel After coming back 3 times, I can tell you that this is the best restaurant I have been to in Tauranga. The service is super fast, the server is super nice and welcoming. I highly recommend it. Maëlle GAGNE The owner is so nice, the food super good and they will make sure that you have enough food ! I will recommend it so far ! Lina D-HAHAN The man who served us was so lovely and kind making the experience wonderful 10/10 recommend Jayda Williamson

homepage_content: King Made Noodles Queenstown | Queenstown | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to King Made Noodles Queenstown PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to King Made Noodles Queenstown Order Online from King Made Noodles Queenstown Asian & Chinese Cuisine * 5 Athol St Queenstown 9300 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS A2. Homemade Braised Beef Noodle Soup 红烧牛肉面 $25.90 A8. Dumplings (10 Pcs) 水饺 $18.50 TOP SELLERS A2. Homemade Braised Beef Noodle Soup 红烧牛肉面 $25.90 A8. Dumplings (10 Pcs) 水饺 $18.50 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Friday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Saturday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Sunday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Monday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Tuesday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Wednesday Closed 11am to 8:30pm REVIEWS I came here for dinner and ordered two noodle soups — the chilli beef noodle soup and the beef with sour cabbage and pickles. Both were absolutely amazing. The broth was clean, warm, and flavourful, the portions of beef were generous, and the hand-made noodles were perfectly chewy and delicate. It felt like a truly authentic Chinese dining experience. One small piece of feedback: a lot of things are self-service (cutlery, cups, water, bowls), but the staff didn’t mention this upfront, so it took us a moment to figure it out. Overall, great food and definitely worth a visit for noodle lovers! Seulki Chung Lovely Lanzhou noodles perfect for the cold rainy weather. We usually struggle to find good Lanzhou noodles outside of Melbourne. So we came in with our doubts, but they definitely exceeded expectations. Soup had lovely flavours and just hit the soul. Noodles are freshly hand pulled and perfectly cooked. Meat was flavourful and tender. Portion are good as well. Price wise it’s okay and on par with most of the Queenstown restaurants. Melbourne Local The line for FBurger was around the block so tried here. Amazing food. Clean, fresh, fast, authentic. Really good flavour. Little tip, we got takeaway and went up to the Lookout to eat. Ashley Flower I really love their beef bone Noodle soup! I have it every time I come to Queenstown. Soup is so comforting and beef just melts in your mouth. Love it! Jenny Son PREV NEXT LOCATION × Average Customer Rating 4.4 I came here for dinner and ordered two noodle soups — the chilli beef noodle soup and the beef with sour cabbage and pickles. name: Lucky Kitchen
homepage_content: Lucky Kitchen | Auckland CBD | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Lucky Kitchen PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Lucky Kitchen Order Online from Lucky Kitchen Asian & Chinese Cuisine * Mid-City Arcade, Unit 2d/239 Queen St Auckland CBD, Auckland 1010 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS 虾卷 Prawn Rolls $15.80 腊味炒饭/面 Sausage & Smoked Pork Fried Rice/Noodle $20.30 TOP SELLERS 虾卷 Prawn Rolls $15.80 腊味炒饭/面 Sausage & Smoked Pork Fried Rice/Noodle $20.30 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup LUNCH DINNER Thursday 10am to 3pm 5pm to 10pm Friday 10am to 3pm 5pm to 10pm Saturday 10am to 3pm 5pm to 10pm Sunday 10am to 3pm 5pm to 10pm Monday 10am to 3pm 5pm to 10pm Tuesday 10am to 3pm 5pm to 10pm Wednesday 10am to 3pm 5pm to 10pm REVIEWS I believe this is a Chinese dinner opening for some years. My first time visit here for a quick lunch, turns out a disappointing one. By looking at the posters on the wall, I had some expectations to my order. When it was served I was speechless because basically it's just some chopped roasted ducks soaking in a bowl red chilli oil, with a few veges, and that sells $25. If it's delicious I would totally feel okay because it's worth every penny you paid. Unfortunately, it's not the case. Well, I still finished all simply didn't want to waste my food since I already paid for it. But, there won't be a next time though. Eric Chou奧克蘭寶哥 Place: The ambience was lovely and it was clean (though I ate there during off-peak hours). Staff/Counter/Waitress: She is bubbly and helpful. She thought I don't know how to use chopsticks and so kind of her to offer me a fork. 🤣😛 Thanks miss! Food: I ordered 2 dishes, they are: 1. ND05 - Sour and spicy potato noodle (NZ$11.80) Not that bad, but not so good. Well, apart from the plum vinegar which gave the sour taste and the dried chilli with overflowing chilli oil on it that gives that spicy flavor, nothing much special with it even if there are minced pork and bean sprouts. 2. SF01 - Pork and Cabbage Fried Dumplings (NZ$14) I was surprised when I saw the dumplings as soon as it was served, the dough ends (wrapper) was light green and it smells pandan and definitely it was! Nice catch for that one but I don't think it goes really well with the filling and plum vinegar. There are 19 pieces but quite small compared to the usual and less filling inside thus what can you say with those 19 pieces, haha🤣. (PS: They just serve plum vinegar with it and when I asked for chilli and ginger, the staff said they do not have and she seemed puzzled why I will put ginger in it. Well, in my stay in Singapore, that's how they eat it and also my Chinese friends will nod to that too!) I didn't get to take photo of the dumplings because I actually forgot about it and awed with the colour. Debbie Reyes Very tasty mixure of Chinese foods. My favorites are the Chinese burger and the Chongqing xiao mian. They usually have Chinese TV shows on the TVs way too loud and if you don't speak good Chinese they tend to just take your order card and do it before you can verify some things you have ordered. As a result I have had the wrong thing more than once. David Lots of choices of Chinese food and beverages but unfortunately when I visited, there were also a lot of them marked temporary unavailable. The food did not disappoint though, good portion and very tasty. The menu is conveniently in both English and Chinese and there is a bell on each table when waiter attention is needed. Overall, the experience was pleasant and I’ll go back again to try more! Debby Wei PREV NEXT LOCATION × Average Customer Rating 3.8 I believe this is a Chinese dinner opening for some years. Authentic food from GuangDong, South China. Porridge and the Clay Pot Rice very good, must try. The crispy pork hand is my personal favorite Dan Wang Food amazing, atmosphere and service typical of a spot on Chinese restaurant. Dumplings big and juicy. Crispy noodles to die for and delicious pork dishes. This is the spot to go to if you find yourself craving some Chinese food. I’d say tho if you are looking for a nice fancy restaurant and perfect service this place might not be for you, but if you’re in for the food and the kind family like hospitality this is it. The waitress was genuinely sweet and just her was enough to give the place 5 stars. The fact that the food was to die for was even better. Lorenzo Pugi Went here for my mum's birthday today and was very impressed by the food. Up there with the best Cantonese style food in Wellington. Really varied menu with some unique dishes that I haven't seen on menus before. We ordered a lot of dishes and every dish was fresh and delicious. Highlights were the roast pork, beef with ginger and spring onion, stuffed eggplant and pepper, fried dumplings and the chicken stuffed with shrimp paste and topped with almonds. Can't wait to come back and try the soups. Sara Greig Excellent food, full of flavour. An enjoyable eating experience. Definitely recommend the standard dishes, or try out the more authentic dishes not listed on the main menu. Noel J Had another amazing meal at my favorite Wellington restaurant. Connect with Indian Zaikaa Restaurant Today Contact Us About Us Indian Zaikaa Restaurant, located at 287 Featherston Street in Palmerston North Central, offers a culinary journey into the rich and diverse flavors of Indian cuisine. Situated in the heart of Palmerston North, this restaurant is a beacon for food enthusiasts eager to experience authentic Indian dishes. The ambiance at Indian Zaikaa is warm and inviting, with traditional Indian decor creating a cozy yet vibrant atmosphere. The menu features a wide array of dishes, from classic favorites like Butter Chicken and Lamb Rogan Josh to a variety of vegetarian options such as Paneer Tikka and Dal Makhani. Each dish is meticulously prepared using fresh ingredients and a blend of spices that capture the essence of Indian cooking. The restaurant's chefs are skilled in the art of balancing spices to perfection, ensuring that every bite is a harmonious blend of flavors. Indian Zaikaa also caters to varying levels of spice tolerance, making it a perfect dining spot for everyone, whether you prefer mild or fiery hot. With friendly and attentive service, Indian Zaikaa ensures a memorable dining experience. Whether you are looking for a quick lunch, a relaxed dinner, or a special occasion, Indian Zaikaa Restaurant in Palmerston North is the ideal destination for savoring the true taste of India.

name: Mediterranean Motel Kaikoura
homepage_content: mediterraneanmotel – 239 Beach Road Kaikoura – FREEPHONE 0800 888 537 Skip to content mediterranean motel Kaikoura BOOK NOW The Mediterranean Motel is facing the magnificent Kaikoura mountain range. Across the road from the motel is a park with seating. The beach is approximately 250 metres stroll from the motel where a walking and bike riding track can be found. The track winds its way along the beach passed the township, passing a couple of historical buildings all the way around to the seal colony at the end of the Kaikoura peninsula. From there the track interconnects with the peninsula walking track where magnificent sweeping views of the mountains and the sea can be enjoyed. All along the beach people can enjoy surf casting where Salmon, Rig,Cod and Kahawai to name a few species are caught. Book Now Location Facilities Things to do

name: Carolineâ€™s Outback Camping Ground
homepage_content: Caroline’s outback camping ground | The New Zealand Camping Guide This website requires JavaScript! Please enable JavaScript in your browser and reload the page! Caroline’s Outback Camping Ground Google Rating (out of 5): 4.4 Review Summary: Caroline’s Outback Camping Ground offers a serene getaway surrounded by stunning landscapes. Customers on platforms like Google Reviews and TripAdvisor have highlighted the peaceful atmosphere and well-maintained facilities. Many appreciate the friendly staff who provide helpful tips about local hikes and sights. The camping spots are spacious, allowing for a more private experience. On the downside, some visitors have noted that WiFi is limited, which can be a drawback for those wanting to stay connected. Others mentioned that road access could be tricky during wet conditions. Overall, Caroline\'s provides a charming camping experience for nature lovers, though improvements in connectivity would enhance the stay. Last Update: 29/04/2025 Google Reviews Link: Google Reviews Link Address: 181 Somme Parade, Aramoho, , Whanganui, Manawatu, North Island DESCRIPTION: The camp is directly behind the Caroline's Boatshed Bar and E atery and TAB and beside the river and the railway line. The cluster of permanent living caravans and house buses, and the back yard bits and pieces around the place give the camp a lived-in, rather than a holiday feel. The ablutions and kitchen are basic. Bruce is the on-site manager. homepage_content: Lotus Indian Takeaways Albany Auckland | Order Online at 12/21-23 Corinthian Drive Welcome To Lotus Indian Takeaways Order Online Welcome To Lotus Indian Takeaways Order Online Previous Next Entree Explore a world of taste with our diverse range of entrees Mains Elevating mains to an art form, one plate at a time Contact Us Questions, comments, or just want to say hi? Contact us! About Us Welcome to Lotus Indian Takeaways Lotus Garden Restaurant, nestled in the heart of Havelock North, New Zealand, invites diners on a culinary journey through the flavors of the East. Located at 14 Te Mata Road, this gem of a restaurant offers a serene and inviting atmosphere, perfect for a relaxing meal with family and friends. With a focus on authentic Asian cuisine, Lotus Garden boasts a menu that tantalizes taste buds with a diverse selection of dishes, ranging from traditional favorites to innovative creations. Whether you're craving the bold spices of Szechuan cuisine, the delicate flavors of Japanese sushi, or the aromatic herbs of Thai dishes, there's something to satisfy every palate. The restaurant's commitment to using fresh, locally sourced ingredients ensures that each dish bursts with vibrant flavors and wholesome goodness. Accompanied by impeccable service and a warm ambiance, dining at Lotus Garden is an experience to savor. Whether you're seeking a casual dinner or a special celebration, Lotus Garden Restaurant promises a memorable dining experience that transports you to the bustling streets of Asia, right in the heart of Havelock North. Genuinely one of the nicest butter chicken's I've ever had. I also attribute it to eating around some really important people in my life kaia thompson Lovely people, food is quality and great service. These guys will make the meal exactly how you want it. Give them a try. Paul in Havelock. Paul Bucks Outstanding Indian food - authentic in flavour and presentation. The best in the Village! Neil McCorkell Review Us Contact Us 14 Te Mata Road, Havelock North 4130, New Zealand 06 877 1999 Opening Hours Monday: 11:30am - 1:30pm, 4:15pm - 9:00pm Tuesday & Sunday: 4:15pm - 9:00pm Wednesday To Saturday: 11:30am - 1:30pm, 4:15pm - 9:00pm Â© all rights reserved. name: Stratosfare Restaurant & Bar
homepage_content: Stratosfare Restaurant & Bar | Skyline Queenstown Today at Skyline Queenstown 7 °C few clouds Open Hours Park Maps Today at Skyline Queenstown Friday 21 November 7 °C °F few clouds Humidity : 95 % Wind : 2 km/h Weather updates every two hours. Getting here Parking FAQs Gondola Closed 9:30 am to 9:00 pm Luge Closed 10:00 am to 8:00 pm Mountain Bike Uplift Closed 10:00am to 7:00pm Stratosfare Restaurant & Bar Closed 11:45 am to 8:45 pm See our full open hours Park map Luge map Book Now Things To Do Stratosfare Restaurant Stratosfare Restaurant & Bar A premium buffet dining experience with unforgettable views. A buffet dining experience with views to match Every booking at Stratosfare Restaurant includes more than just exceptional buffet dining; it’s an all-in-one alpine adventure. Your ticket includes: A return Gondola ride to the top of Bob’s Peak A PhotoPass to capture your journey A buffet lunch or dinner at Stratosfare Restaurant & Bar Situated high above Queenstown, Stratosfare Restaurant offers unforgettable panoramic views of Lake Wakatipu, the Remarkables, and beyond. Feast on a wide selection of local flavours, from grilled meats and fresh seafood to vibrant plant-based dishes and decadent desserts. Whether you’re marking a special occasion or simply indulging in the view, Stratosfare Restaurant is Queenstown’s most scenic and satisfying buffet dining destination. View Menu Breathtaking views Delicious food Dessert For that extra special occasion Amazing venue on top of the world Lunch with a view Looking for a midday escape? Our lunch service is perfect for recharging after morning activities, and it’s exceptional value. Enjoy everything included in your ticket while dining in the sunlit alpine setting. A great option for families, groups, or those with packed travel itineraries. Make it Premium Choose our Premium Dining option and you’ll get a window table, our best seats for uninterrupted views of Queenstown and the surrounding Wakatipu Basin, plus you get a house drink of your choice. Book today to secure your table at Queenstown’s iconic Stratosfare Restaurant! Panoramic view of Lake Wakatipu Award-winning cuisine Locally sourced ingredients Watch Video " The Gondola ride up and the Stratosfare Skyline dinner was fanstastic experience, the restaurant manager went an extra step to introduce the type of foods in the restaurant and the popular dish thar must try. Some of the dessert in Stratofare is the best I had in NZ. " Samuel2W – Trip Advisor Ready to experience it all? Book now to secure your table and enjoy Queenstown’s best all-in-one dining and sightseeing experience. Book now Frequently Asked Questions: Do I need a reservation? Yes, reservations are essential, especially during peak season and weekends. You can book online or by calling our reservations team. Can I visit Stratosfare without taking the Gondola? No, access to Stratosfare is via the Gondola, which is included in your restaurant ticket booking. Your Gondola ride is part of the full Stratosfare experience. What dining options are available? Stratosfare offers an all-you-can-eat buffet with seasonal dishes, local produce, and a variety of vegetarian and gluten-free options. Premium desserts and beverages are also available. Are dietary requirements accommodated at Stratosfare Yes. Please notify our team of any allergies or dietary requirements when booking, and we’ll do our best to accommodate them. The buffet also has labels to show what allergins may be present. Is Stratosfare wheelchair accessible? Yes. The restaurant is fully accessible from the Gondola terminal, with ramps and accessible facilities available. You might also like: Market Kitchen Café Woodfired pizzas, a tandoor oven, and freshly baked treats. Plus so much more. Learn More Gondola Start your day with a Gondola ride, taking you 480m up over Lake Wakatipu to the top of Bob’s Peak. Enjoy spectacular views of Coronet Peak, The Remarkables, Walter and Cecil Peak and, of course, Queenstown. Learn More Guided Walks Take an unforgettable journey up Ben Lomond, one of the greatest walks in New Zealand, discovering our region's history, geography, flora and fauna. Learn More

name: Petaling Malaysian Restaurant
homepage_content: Petaling Malaysian Restaurant | Mount Eden | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Petaling Malaysian Restaurant Malaysian - 4.6 248a Dominion Rd, Mount Eden, Auckland 1024 × Average Customer Rating 4.6 Had dinner with my son 26 Oct 2025. He heard of the place from his friends so we decided to go there. We had Nasi Lemak with Rendang Beef, pineapple fried rice, and squid nestum. Hot Tea was complimentary. All the fare tasted great. Service was reasonably well. Atmosphere was just right. Asian and Kiwi customers were dining that night. All in all a very fine dining experience. VJR AD Real authentic tasting Malaysian cuisine. The portions are generous and the flavours are spot on. We had the deep fried snapper with curry sauce, Homemade egg tofu with soy sauce, Marmite Sauce Chicken and a Eggplant dish. Parking at the rear, but need to register on the Ipad once inside William Lin On the list for me top 3 Malaysian restaurants in Auckland (as of August 2025). Petaling serves up great food with great service. My pick to try are the butter floss range of dishes and the Kam Heong chicken. Make sure to book if you’re attempting to visit on Thursday, Friday, or Saturday 🤪 Ben Ch I had an amazing experience here. The flavors were rich, bold, and incredibly authentic — exactly what Malaysian food should be. The curry had the perfect balance of spice and aroma, the satay was tender with a delicious smoky char, and the kaya toast took me straight back to Southeast Asia. Every dish tasted like it was made with care and real attention to detail. The staff were warm and welcoming, happy to explain dishes and offer recommendations, which made my family so happy Kiwi Ki Top of my list for Malaysian food just sadly they close every Tuesdays. I love the food it's authentic Malaysian Food. 👍 and the kopi peng is almost the same the one they got in malaysian. 👏 L G × × - + ADD 0 ATTENTION × Are you sure you want to place this order for tomorrow? name: Nitefun 98 Bar Restaurant Gaming Lounge
homepage_content: Nitefun 98 Bar Restaurant | Pakuranga Heights | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Nitefun 98 Bar Restaurant PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Nitefun 98 Bar Restaurant Order Online from Nitefun 98 Bar Restaurant bar resataurant * 491 Pakuranga Rd Pakuranga Heights, Auckland 2010 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS C4 Chicken Fried Rice 鸡肉炒饭 $20.00 C7 Salted Fish and Chicken Fried Rice 咸鱼鸡粒炒饭 $20.00 TOP SELLERS C4 Chicken Fried Rice 鸡肉炒饭 $20.00 C7 Salted Fish and Chicken Fried Rice 咸鱼鸡粒炒饭 $20.00 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 4:30pm to 12am Friday Closed 4:30pm to 12am Saturday Closed 4:30pm to 12am Sunday Closed 4:30pm to 12am Monday Closed 4:30pm to 12am Tuesday Closed 4:30pm to 12am Wednesday Closed 4:30pm to 12am REVIEWS First time at Nitefun 98 Bar Restaurant & Gaming Lounge — and definitely won’t be the last! The staff were absolutely amazing — super friendly, accommodating, and made us feel welcome from the moment we walked in. The cocktail selection was fantastic, with plenty of fun and creative options to try. We ordered the squid rings and spring rolls, and both were delicious! The dipping sauce was a little too spicy for my liking 🥴, but still packed with great flavor. We booked Karaoke Room 2, which fit our group of 10 comfortably — spacious, clean, and with an awesome song list that kept us singing all night! 🎤🎶 Overall, an awesome vibe, great service, and a perfect spot for a fun night out with friends. Highly recommend checking it out! Camerlite Tagiilima Good food, excellent Karaoke - the system looks newly upgraded and there are many latest songs inc Bruno Mars Dying with a smile, Malay songs, Korean songs etc. We went during happy hour $25pp includes $25 worth of food and 3 hours of karaoke room. Great selection of food and they were delicious and good portions. Easy, free parking. The ladies toilet when we went was a let down - it looks clean and nicely presented, however there was a really bad smell from the toilets - maybe the sewerage system was faulty - i had to cover my nose with my shirt when inside - a mask would have been a lifesaver. Michelle Ong Reviewing Karaoke only. Came here for "Happy Hour" on a Friday night 6pm to 9pm. Their phone number has issues, so we just turned up and there were rooms available. Although it may pay to book if you can. Reasonably priced for 3 hours and you can order food, which is added as part of your total minimum charge. Song selection is not bad. William Lin Very friendly and accomodating staff, karaoke system is OK to use but was much better onced we starting using their youtube app for songs not showing on their main system (PS: make sure to have "karaoke" in your youtube searches to get the lyric displayed music videos). Only negative was the sewage smell in the main reception area but karaoke rooms had aircon to prevent it lingering in there. Overall fun experience, would definitely go back. Junior Lalovao PREV NEXT LOCATION × Average Customer Rating 3.8 First time at Nitefun 98 Bar Restaurant & Gaming Lounge — and definitely won’t be the last! The staff were absolutely amazing — super friendly, accommodating, and made us feel welcome from the moment we walked in. homepage_content: Mela Eatery Indo Nepalese Street Food in Dunedin | Octagon | Order Indian Nepalese Food Online Mela Eatery Dunedin 375 George Street, Central Dunedin, Dunedin 9016, New Zealand Order online call us 03-470 1652 Mela Eatery Octagon 11 The Octagon, Central Dunedin, Dunedin 9016, New Zealand Order online call us 03 470 1603 About Restaurant Mela Eatery Dunedin Welcome to Mela Eatery, a culinary oasis nestled in the heart of Dunedin, New Zealand, at 375 George Street. Our restaurant offers a unique dining experience that celebrates the rich tapestry of flavors from across the Indian subcontinent, infused with a contemporary twist. As you step into Mela Eatery, you're greeted by an ambiance that blends modern elegance with traditional charm. The warm hues, intricate decor, and inviting atmosphere set the stage for an unforgettable culinary journey. Our menu is a symphony of vibrant spices, fresh ingredients, and culinary craftsmanship. From classic favorites like butter chicken and aromatic biryanis to innovative creations that push the boundaries of flavor, each dish at Mela Eatery is a testament to our passion for excellence. Join us at Mela Eatery and embark on a culinary adventure that transcends borders and celebrates the universal language of food. Experience the magic of Indian cuisine reimagined at 375 George Street, Central Dunedin. order online Mela Eatery Dunedin order online order online Mela Eatery Octagon order online About Restaurant Mela Eatery Octagon Welcome to Mela Eatery Octagon, where culinary excellence meets cultural fusion in the heart of Central Dunedin, New Zealand. Nestled within the vibrant atmosphere of The Octagon, this restaurant invites diners on a gastronomic journey through the rich tapestry of flavors from across the globe. Mela, which means "gathering" or "fair" in various South Asian languages, encapsulates the spirit of community and celebration that permeates the eatery's ambiance. As you step inside, you are greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere, where contemporary dÃ©cor seamlessly merges with traditional accents, creating a setting that is both elegant and comfortable. Pair your meal with a selection from the extensive drinks menu, which includes fine wines, craft beers, and exotic cocktails inspired by flavors from around the world. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion with friends and family or simply craving a delicious meal, Mela Eatery Octagon offers a dining experience that is sure to delight the senses. location how to find us? Named after the iconic "number 8 wire" - a symbol of Kiwi ingenuity and resourcefulness - this restaurant celebrates the innovative spirit that defines the nation. name: Regal Chinese Restaurant
homepage_content: Regal Chinese Rest - Hamilton | Hamilton | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Regal Chinese Rest - Hamilton Chinese - 4.1 62 Bryce St, Hamilton 3204 × Average Customer Rating 4.1 My hubby and I had lunch at Regal Chinese Restaurant at Hamilton on 9/7/2025. As we went there at around 2:45pm, the lady staff told us that we had to order our food as soon as possible. We ordered four dishes very quickly. Food was okay but was not so impressive. Addie Lane Very quiet but good Chinese food, staff speak Mandarin and Cantonese. Food was tasty, it wasn’t oily. Emily Hui It’s really delicious — I’ve been here several times already. Elena First time trying dim sum in Hamilton, and it was okay! The sticky lotus rice was basically just sticky rice, barely any filling and colour. The prawn toast and deep fried pork dumpling was good Dana Young Yum Cha - the authentic Canton cuisine. Another great discovery. My wife had a short conference at Hamilton, and we decided to have a date. It has been a long time since I brought her for a good authentic Chinese cuisin, and both of us loved Dim Sum (点心) a touch of heart and I want to touch her heart through her mouth. I explored the night before and found this place Regal Chinese Restaurant (富豪- literally means rich man) to Yum Cha (饮茶 - drink tea) Of course, we need delicious Dim Sum to go with the tea. The reviews were not outstanding, but when we were welcomed by friendly waitresses and the ambience was very Cheena, we felt at home right away. In fact, the very success of a Chinese restaurant is to have a good chef. And I found out that he is from Canton. Canton cuisine is, to me, one of the most meticulous and uncompromising cuisines. That's why it is so delicious. The menu has so many items and we picked a few that we both like. E.g. Phoenix Crawl, (百合酱凤爪) Siew Mai, (烧卖) Chee Cheong Fun or Fun Cheong,(鲜虾肠粉) Salted Water Dumplings, (咸水角) and Lo Mai Gai (瑶柱糯米鸡) Our favourite of the day is really the Chee Cheong Fun or Fun Cheong,(鲜虾肠粉) and Siew Mai, (烧卖). The Fun Cheong is wrap with a steamed skin, soft and flavourful sauce. But when we took the first bite... my goodness, there is another layer of skin with is deep fried and crispy. Amazing skin within a skin. What a gastronomical pleasure when the softness and crunch mixed in union, it is unprecedented! Then when I took my first bite at the the Siew Mai, my literal expression is... woah! The Prawn is very fresh and the Pork is tender. A wonderful Q feeling when chewing the Siew Mai. This is definitely a destination for my family, friends, and for anyone who will visit us in NZ. They know who they are. troo foo × × - + ADD 0 ATTENTION × Are you sure you want to place this order for tomorrow? name: Salt Mango Tree - South Indian Restaurant
Sampan House Dunedin 64 St Andrew St
homepage_content: Sampan House | Dunedin | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Sampan House RESERVATIONS PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Sampan House Order Online from Sampan House Chinese, Cambodian, Asian * 64 St Andrew St Dunedin 9016 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Chicken Satay Burger $7.40 Sampan Spicy Fried Egg Noodles (Roast Pork) $20.40 TOP SELLERS Chicken Satay Burger $7.40 Sampan Spicy Fried Egg Noodles (Roast Pork) $20.40 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Friday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Saturday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Sunday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Monday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Tuesday Closed 11am to 8:30pm Wednesday Closed 11am to 8:30pm REVIEWS Absolutely delicious food, lovely and attentive servers and enormous portions!! Also great value for money. Definitely worth coming to. Special shoutout to the Sampan spicy fried noodles and the chicken in black bean sauce :)) Elissa Hall A hidden gem this place is indeed⭐️ I’m not the type to go the extra mile to post a review, however! This place deserves to be raved about. I have dined here many times, and each visit I have consistently had a meal that has been to the same quality of the last dish I have ordered of its kind. Dining in on Saturday night I ordered the fried noodles with chicken. Meal was flavourful and noodles were perfectly fried. The high level of tasty and love is definitely poured in to the food from Sampan and it’s nice to see a place do its basic offerings really well. Price and portion sizing is definitely lower in price and above par with its portions compared to competitors. Well worth the money. The restaurant and dining space is clean and the service is quick from ordering to receiving your meal. The owners are lovely and the food speaks of that love. J'adore (Jaja) The food wasn't met my expectations, but the chicken fried rice was nice. I like the smokey taste from the rice. The price was fine, but the services needed to be improved. The atmosphere is just ok, clean enough, and not many seats and tables are available. Erika Astried This is from my time in Dunedin and using zomato but due to death of zomato wanted to put this review somewhere. Hope Sampan house is still serving the goods. Update 12/7/19 ordered the red roasted pork belly and am I so glad it comes with a bowl of rice, and the portion for the price is pretty generous and very similar to the special rice dish of mao's braised pork belly that chopsticks have. Taste wise a sweet sauce but nothing spectacular, tasty, but I would've liked more sauce. The meat was tender but slightly more bouncy and firm, and could've done with more flavour. Compared to the chopsticks mao pork belly, definitely less oily with a more 'clean' feeling, but is more chewy with thicker cut pork chunks. Both are very good and of the same value, so depending on your mood, either is a good choice. 4/5 Update 7/7/19 ordered the Sichuan spicy double cooked pork belly, a very decent portion for price with a good portion of meat and veg cooked with authentic flavour! Fantastic pork belly slices and they didn't slump out on portion of meat, and there was decent veg with a good bit of fungi, carrot, cabbage and onion. Rice is also included in the meal which is a bonus. Happy with the quality, definitely comparable to chopsticks! 4/5 My friends ordered the ginger beef which was a generous portion and tasty, and and two crispy ducks. Everyone was very happy with their meal and everything came with a portion of rice. Dined in and ordered a medium beef supreme satay. Flavor was sweet yet. It overpowering but lacked in savory taste-however I was warned beforehand by the friendly staff there that this was a sweet dish. The peanut flavor was present and mixed well with the sweet flavor, the beef was cooked well, tender but still chewy. Portion was decent for the price. 3.5/5 just because I wasn't blown away but makes a good quick eat out meal. Definitely keen to check them out again and try more of their menu! Rosie Lovely service and great food! Highly recommend. A great place for lunch away from the loud main street. ORDER ONLINE About Mt Everest Kitchen Blockhouse Bay Nestled in the heart of Blockhouse Bay, Auckland, Mt Everest Kitchen stands as a culinary beacon for enthusiasts of Nepalese and Indian cuisine. Located at 571 Blockhouse Bay Road, this unpretentious eatery has garnered a reputation for delivering authentic flavors in a warm and inviting atmospher. Mt Everest Kitchen's menu is a testament to the rich culinary traditions of Nepal and India. Patrons can embark on a gastronomic journey beginning with enticing entrÃ©es such as crispy samosas and succulent momosâtraditional Nepalese dumplings that have become a house favorite. The main courses offer a plethora of hearty dishes, including aromatic curries, sizzling stir-fries, and fragrant biryanis. The restaurant prides itself on its welcoming ambiance, characterized by vibrant and colorful interiors that reflect the rich cultures of Nepal and India. The cozy setting is ideal for both intimate dinners and larger gatherings. Customer reviews frequently highlight the exceptional service, noting the staff's attentiveness and the prompt delivery of orders. One patron remarked on the "super fast service" and "high quality of meats served," underscoring the establishment's commitment to excellence. homepage_content: Seafood Takeaways in Royal Oak | Order fish n chips, seafood, oysters, mussels Online For Takeaways - Order Meal WELCOME TO OUR Seafood Takeaways Royal Oak 730 Manukau Road, Royal Oak, Auckland 1023, New Zealand ORDER ONLINE WELCOME TO OUR Seafood Takeaways Royal Oak 730 Manukau Road, Royal Oak, Auckland 1023, New Zealand ORDER ONLINE WELCOME TO OUR Seafood Takeaways Royal Oak 730 Manukau Road, Royal Oak, Auckland 1023, New Zealand ORDER ONLINE WELCOME TO OUR Seafood Takeaways Royal Oak 730 Manukau Road, Royal Oak, Auckland 1023, New Zealand ORDER ONLINE WELCOME TO OUR Seafood Takeaways Royal Oak 730 Manukau Road, Royal Oak, Auckland 1023, New Zealand ORDER ONLINE About Us Seafood Takeaways Royal Oak Seafood Takeaways in Royal Oak, Auckland General Information For seafood lovers, Royal Oak in Auckland, New Zealand is a great destination with plenty of seafood restaurants and takeaways in the area. If you're looking for a quick bite, Seafood Takeaway is a great option that offers a variety of seafood options. Seafood Takeaway Located at 730 Manukau Road, Seafood Takeaway serves a variety of seafood. Their menu includes classic fish and chips, burgers, oysters, and mussels. The prices are reasonable, and the portions are generous. The takeaway also has a high rating on online reviews. Other Fish and Chips Restaurants in the Area Apart from Seafood Takeaway, there are several highly rated fish and chip restaurants in the area that are worth checking out. These include The Chip Shop, Al & Petes, and Greenwoods Fresh Catch. Each one of these places offers a unique take on the classic dish, and all are reasonably priced. Seafood Restaurants in Auckland Central If you're in the mood for seafood but are not in the Royal Oak area, you can check out The Mariner Fish and Chips, Marsic Fish Shop, and Oceanz Seafood Market. These restaurants are located in Auckland Central and offer a range of seafood options apart from fish and chips. When to Go Seafood Takeaway, and most of the other seafood restaurants in the area, are open seven days a week. The opening hours may vary depending on the restaurant, but typically they are open for lunch and dinner. Getting There The Royal Oak area is easy to reach by car, bus or train. There is plenty of parking available in the area, and several bus routes stop near the seafood takeaways and restaurants. The nearest train station is the Greenlane station. Deep Fried Crispy delights that melt in your mouth! Deep-fried perfection awaits at Seafood Takeaways Royal Oak Burgers Juicy, flavorful, and stacked high. name: The Camel at Araiawa Raio Lodge Pukenui
homepage_content: The Camel at Araiawa Raio Lodge Pukenui - Hotel in Pukenui The Camel at Araiawa Raio Lodge Pukenui 🌎 3864 Far North Road, 0484 Pukenui, New Zealand Book a room Arrival Departure Adults 1 2 3 4 5 6 Children 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 Check Availability The Camel at Araiawa Raio Lodge Pukenui is located in Pukenui and offers Mountain views and Harbour access. This holiday home features barbecue facilities as well as a garden. Featuring a DVD player, the holiday home has a kitchen with a dishwasher, a living room, a dining area, and 1 bathroom with a shower. A flat-screen TV with sports and movie channels is provided. The Camel at Araiawa Raio Lodge Pukenui offers a guest kitchen, stocked with breakfast items, where guests can prepare a Continental breakfast during their stay. The Camel at Araiawa Raio Lodge Pukenui offers a terrace. If you would like to discover the area, windsurfing is possible in the surroundings. There is also a childrens playground and tennis courts close to the property. Kaitaia is 39 km from the accommodation. Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip. name: Salt & Pepper restaurant
homepage_content: Salt & Pepper Papakura | Delicious Indian Takeaway & Curry House in Papakura, Auckland Welcome To Salt & Pepper - Papakura 32 Broadway, Papakura, Auckland 2110, New Zealand Order Online About | Salt & Pepper Salt & Pepper Restaurant, located at 32 Broadway in Papakura, Auckland, is a culinary destination renowned for its diverse menu that spans Indian, Middle Eastern, and European cuisines. The restaurant offers an array of flavorful dishes, including traditional Indian curries like Butter Chicken, Tikka Masala, and Malai Kofta, as well as Middle Eastern specialties such as kebabs. Complementing these are European-inspired options like Cheesy Delight and Pepperoni Delight pizzas, catering to a wide range of tastes. The interior of Salt & Pepper provides a cozy and welcoming atmosphere, making it suitable for both intimate gatherings and family outings. With seating available for up to 20 guests, the restaurant also offers off-site catering services for various events. Patrons have praised the restaurant for its quality and flavorful dishes. One customer noted, "Best garlic and cheese naan, fluffy and great flavour, plus not burnt!!! Really good butter chicken and madras too." Whether you're craving a spicy curry, a savory kebab, or a cheesy pizza, Salt & Pepper Restaurant in Papakura offers a rich tapestry of flavors to satisfy diverse culinary preferences. name: Sushi Gallery
homepage_content: Sushi Gallery | Massey | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Sushi Gallery PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Sushi Gallery Order Online from Sushi Gallery Japanese Cuisine * 404 Don Buck Rd Massey, Auckland 0614 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Crispy Chicken Sushi Roll $1.60 Teriyaki Chicken Sushi Roll $2.20 TOP SELLERS Crispy Chicken Sushi Roll $1.60 Teriyaki Chicken Sushi Roll $2.20 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 8:30am to 6pm Friday Closed 8:30am to 6pm Saturday Closed 8:30am to 6pm Sunday Closed Closed Monday Closed 8:30am to 6pm Tuesday Closed 8:30am to 6pm Wednesday Closed 8:30am to 6pm REVIEWS With the amount of crap that this shop along with the other shops on this strip have to deal with each day in people - a 5 star is due as part of. Sushi is of a very high standard, especially around the lunch time mark when it's coming out fresh to replenish the lunch time demand. Staff here are lovely, even when people are stealing from them! do try the hot stuff, they have some lovely dinner dishes that are well worth getting stuck into. I think it's location doesn't do it justice, so don't expect to be walking into a Sushi bar that should have the same look and feel as in Epsom, with the same sort of personal space. This is Massey, and it's a very busy set of shops. They have huge foot traffic throughout the day through here. You can also order over the phone. They do make sushi to order too. The space is pretty comfortable and their service is great! The food is delicious and pretty balanced! I will come back again someday whenever I can 😊 Alexandra Sanchez Review for Tasty BBQ Restaurant Tasty BBQ Restaurant is our go-to spot when we are in the area when it comes to casual catch-ups with family and friends. We dropped by for a lunch get-together and ordered a bit of everything to share—classic chips, BBQ fried rice, combination fried rice noodles, steamed BBQ pork buns, and salt & pepper squid. For drinks, we had the creamy mango and creamy honeydew pearl drinks. The meals were standard, nothing fancy or standout, but still satisfying enough to fill us up and keep the conversation flowing. The portion sizes were decent, and everything came out fresh and hot. The BBQ flavours were mild, and the pork buns were soft and enjoyable. The drinks were sweet and creamy, just as expected. Overall, it’s a simple spot with familiar flavours, perfect for a relaxed dinner with loved ones. If you’re not looking for anything too adventurous but want a comfortable place to sit down, share some plates, and leave feeling full—this place does the job. Salome Tatafu Just had dinner at this place. Not too big but sitting was comfortable. Understand the restaurant started only 6 months ago. The service was friendly and efficient. The lady serving spoke Mandarin but managed English well to handle your orders. So no worries. As for the food they were tasty and reasonably good. Prices were affordable. If you have problem ordering, just look at the wall. Pictures of dishes were posted all over with prices. A very good selection of dishes. Will definitely visit the place again. We had few dinners later and added more photos of the dishes we ordered. Tony Wan Decent food, nice portion (not so big that I wouldn’t have been able to finish). Beef brisket is a bit tough; could have been stewed longer. 月老mundi Great value for money. Big portions and the best perking duck I’ve had so far as takeout. The roasted pork is crunchy and less salty than many other places (which is a good thing) Rib with perking sauce and honey chicken are also dishes that I highly recommended. The only thing that I didn’t like was the fried rice noodle, I think they overcooked it so suggest if you want to have this dish, have it at the restaurant, not a good choice for takeaway. Thi Mai Phuong Du PREV NEXT LOCATION × Average Customer Rating 4.5 Went to this restaurant for brunch. The space is pretty comfortable and their service is great! They are open later than most so you can still get a good selection after 3pm. The sushi is very western style and not particularly tasty but it is affordable and the seating is nice. The selection is really good and the service is also good. It’s a decent spot to stop for a quick feed. Syd Eats My kids absolutely love this place! We’ve been coming here for over 10 years and still can’t get enough. It’s become one of our weekly go-to spots. The food is consistently fresh and delicious, and the prices are way better than most sushi bento places in Auckland. Easily one of the best-value Japanese cuisine spots in the area. Super friendly and service too, honestly, couldn’t ask for more! Michael Yummy yummy yummy sushi, this place always satisfies when I order from this restaurant. The fried chicken sushi pieces are the tastiest I’ve ever had. This place is going to make me very fat ahehehehehe. b h Wide range of delicious individual pick n mix sushi as well as bigger meals from menu that come fresh and fast. Star Kebab Queen Street "Star Kebab" is a popular restaurant or food establishment that specializes in serving kebabs, a flavorful and aromatic dish originating from the Middle East. Kebabs typically consist of skewered and grilled or roasted meat, often accompanied by various vegetables and seasonings. Star Kebab establishments are known for their diverse kebab offerings, including options like chicken, beef, lamb, or vegetarian kebabs, each prepared with unique marinades and spices. These eateries are often characterized by a casual dining atmosphere, where customers can enjoy freshly cooked kebabs, typically served in pita bread or with rice, along with a variety of condiments and side dishes. Star Kebab is a favorite choice for those seeking a quick and delicious meal with a Middle Eastern or Mediterranean flavor profile. name: Suncourt Indian
homepage_content: Suncourt Indian - Taupo's best indian food Welcome to Food Inspired by the streets of India Time honoured traditional recipes VIEW OUR MENU discover OUR STORY Millions of street food vendors make up the colour, sounds and smells of India. They nourish the appetites of busy office workers, sweaty rickshaw wallahs and hungry school children throughout the day. Our menu pays homage to these road side culinary geniuses. Our food is the simple earthy, lovingly prepared food of the people and represents the tastes of India today. We respect your decisions and we cook all our vegetarian meals separately. Halal meat available on request. Read more about us here serving more than food COMMITMENT TO THE COMMUNITY Nourishing Our Community Beyond the Plate Savoring the Spirit of Giving Trending Tastes Our Viral Video Success When Taste Meets Trend Our Viral Journeys We are more than just delicious Indian food At Suncourt Indian, our commitment goes beyond just the flavours we bring to your table. We believe in nourishing not just the body but also the spirit of our community. Our dedication to supporting local events and initiatives is a core value that drives everything we do. Whether sponsoring local sports teams, participating in charity fundraisers, or providing meals to those in need, we are committed to making a positive impact. As a vital part of the community, we see it as our mission to give back in meaningful ways, ensuring that our success is shared with the people who make our neighbourhood thrive. Our commitment to the community is unwavering, and we will continue to support and uplift it in every way we can. Supporting Volunteer Organisations in Taupo At our Suncourt Indian, we believe in the power of community and the importance of giving back. That’s why we’re dedicated to supporting volunteer organizations in Taupo, offering our resources and services to help those who make a difference. Whether providing meals for volunteers during events or contributing to local initiatives, we are committed to helping those who selflessly serve our community. Together, we can create a stronger, more connected Taupo. It’s our collective support that makes our town a better place to live, and we’re all part of this journey. See us on Facebook Committed to Your Dietary Needs At Suncourt Indian, we respect your dietary preferences. We offer a variety of options, including keto, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, and halal dishes, to ensure you can enjoy a delicious meal that aligns with your lifestyle. Whether you’re looking for health-conscious choices or specific dietary accommodations, our menu is designed with you in mind. Let us provide you with the flavours you love, tailored to meet your unique needs. Order Now Celebrating Five Years in Taupo and Many More to Come As we approach our 6th birthday in Taupo, we’re filled with gratitude for the support and love from this amazing community. Our journey has been incredible, and we are committed to staying here and continuing to serve the delicious food you love. We look forward to many more years of being a part of Taupo’s vibrant community, supporting local initiatives, and sharing memorable moments with you all. Thank you for making us a part of your lives—we’re here to stay! Order Now Our Commitment to Making You Smile At Suncourt Indian Taupo, we always strive to respect and put a smile on our customers’ faces. From the moment you walk in or place an order, our goal is to provide you with delicious food and a warm and welcoming experience. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we’re dedicated to going the extra mile to ensure you leave with a smile. Thank you for choosing us—we’re here to make every meal memorable! Order Now Celebrating Together: Your Joy Is Our Joy When you celebrate, we celebrate right along with you. Whether it’s a special occasion or just a meal to brighten your day, we’re here to make every moment memorable. At Suncourt Indian, we take pride in being a part of your celebrations, big or small. Your happiness is our happiness, and we’re honoured to share in the joy of your special moments. Here’s to many more shared celebrations! Order Now our AMAZING CHEFS Suncourt Indian has southern/northern Indian food consisting of flavourful spices, deep rich curries, lentils, and variations of a tandoor. Offering a different range of spice levels, subtle to pungent; mild to hot Indian food that caters to both vegetarians and non-vegetarians. homepage_content: The Black Dog Kitchen & Bar | Dunedin | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to The Black Dog Kitchen & Bar RESERVATIONS PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to The Black Dog Kitchen & Bar Order Online from The Black Dog Kitchen & Bar Western Cuisine * 109 Princes St Dunedin 9016 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Chicken Filo Chicken fillets with camembert cheese, cranberry, pistachio nuts, bacon and oven baked in a filo pastry. Served with fries and aioli. $20.90 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup LUNCH DINNER Thursday 8am to 5pm 8pm to 2:30pm Friday Closed 8am to 8pm Saturday Closed 8am to 8pm Sunday Closed 8am to 8pm Monday 8am to 2pm Closed Tuesday 8am to 5pm 8pm to 2:30pm Wednesday 8am to 5pm 8pm to 2:30pm REVIEWS My new favourite place for coffee!!! incredible place, they know what they are doing. Cant recommend enough! Desserts were divine, little pricey but couldn't fault Mia Coopers The Black Dog impressed everyone in our party in every way possible. It was a fantastic Sunday brunch. A great layout where we had a very private space. The food was amazing at a reasonable price. The staff were so nice and our every need was catered for. The server remembered my friend who hasn't been there in a while. After a lovely time aa we departed, the chef took the time to meet us, and he was busy. Highly recommend to all. Geoff Flaws We got takeaway, but the inside dining wasn't too busy. The food was amazing, bigger than we would have thought too! The veggie burger and the chicken filo were so good! Fresh, hot, and filling! Definitely on the expensive side for what we got but was totally worth it, they also have cakes and pastries inside! Fast and a great choice! Ryan Richard Totally decadent Chocolate egg... thought I would have just a coffee but brought this decadence home!! $8 & delicious... choc shell, marshmallows and ganache inside... 2 dessert portions!! Won't do it again but encourage others to 'have a go' just for a oncer!! Helen Beamish Nice staff, delish food, I tried the souffle omlette and was stunned at the huge size of it. This place as a range of seating, tables of 2 to 12, also couches to relax on and bar stools. Lots of space and am enjoyable place to dine in at. name: The Munted Jandal Gourmet Burger Kitchen
Tasty Canteen
homepage_content: Tasty Canteen | Henderson | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Tasty Canteen PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Tasty Canteen Order Online from Tasty Canteen Chinese Takeaway * 254 Lincoln Rd Henderson, Auckland 0610 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Chicken Nugget $1.10 Chicken Nibble $1.30 TOP SELLERS Chicken Nugget $1.10 Chicken Nibble $1.30 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 11:30am to 10pm Friday Closed 11:30am to 10pm Saturday Closed 11:30am to 10pm Sunday Closed 11:30am to 10pm Monday Closed 11:30am to 10pm Tuesday Closed Closed Wednesday Closed 11:30am to 10pm REVIEWS First time I tried this place. Was very clean and Very delicious food. Would definitely be going there again. Chicken fried rice was delicious with a lot of chicken chunks. Fried chicken nibbles was fresh and batter was very crunchy. Pork bun tasted as good as the one I had previously at Stanley roast Kelston. Cost was reasonable will definitely be going back when in town. Neetah Ordered wonton noodle soup via uber eats. Comes with about 7 or 8 large pork wontons with good flavour and well cooked (firm cooked meat texture vs jelly meat mushy like some others. Broth isn't anything amazing but is fine and veges were fresh. Wairaka Mason The food here is good! I don’t know why but I’ve always avoided this place… The honey chicken w/ fried rice will have you hooked. Nasi goreng is alright too, but not spicy enough lol. Give them a go. M TL Really clean kitchen and it is run by husband (chef) and wife. I tried their 9th dish on the menu : 3 in 1 Mixed Chicken Fried Rice, Combination Chow Mein (Pork & Beef), Egg Foo Young . Perfectly cooked juicy and taste with good quantity of crunchy vegetables (carrot, onion, broccoli, cauliflower). The chef cooks simultaneously 3 dishes on 3 woks and he is an artist with precision the way he adds spice to food. The best part is food wasn't oily, taste, good quantity, generous amount of meat and even after eating more than half of the meal doesn't feel too heavy on the stomach as it is not oily. Great customer service. Will return back to try rest of the menu. Brian D'souza Quick service ~ 10min wait Delicious food that tastes fresh There is a reasonable amount of parking right outsider the takeaways. Wes Welch PREV NEXT LOCATION × Average Customer Rating 4 First time I tried this place. Was very clean and Very delicious food. Would definitely be going there again.
