name: The Packhouse - Lumberjack Brewing
homepage_content: The Packhouse – Te Puke Skip to content Pub and Cafe Craft beer, house roasted coffee and mouth watering eats Book a Table Order Delivery Catering The Packhouse is the home of Lumberjack Brewing and Te Puke’s home of great food and drink. Hand crafted beer, house roasted coffee and delicious pub food available from Wednesday to Sunday, 11am-9pm. Beer All of our tap beer is hand crafted in 600L batches at our brewery in Pukehina. Not into craft beer? Our award winning Lager and Te Puke Draught are on tap full time, as well as a range of bottled beer. Coffee Our coffee is a house roasted blend of arabica beans from Brazil and Ethiopia. Our beans are roasted weekly and are available to purchase for takeaway. Food Everything on our menu is made daily from fresh, local ingredients. We partner with other businesses that share the same values and focus on quality that we do. All of our tap beer is hand crafted in 600L batches at our brewery in Pukehina. Not into craft beer? Our award winning Lager and Te Puke Draught are on tap full time, as well as a range of bottled beer. Our coffee is a house roasted blend of arabica beans from Brazil and Ethiopia. Our beans are roasted weekly and are available to purchase for takeaway. Everything on our menu is made daily from fresh, local ingredients. We partner with other businesses that share the same values and focus on quality that we do. Where To Find Us 4 Palmer Place, Te Puke 021 0859 8263 Wednesday - Sunday, 11am - 9pm Pub, restaurant or al fresco dining options available (garden bar or street dining) On and off licence 200+ free car parks available Wheelchair accessible Free wifi View Menu What Our Customers Have To Say "Great place and dog friendly! Food was amazing - would definitely go there again. Service was quick and the place was quiet and relaxing!" - Josie H "Pub food done to perfection with exceptional service and atmosphere to match. Exactly what Te Puke needs, somewhere that ticks every box." - Kimberly R "Been here a few times now and the food is amazing, the service is fantastic. It has such a great atmosphere. Absolutely love having it as a local Te Puke jaunt." - Joel T "This is my favourite place in Te Puke! Absolutely love the food and the coffee is beyond amazing. Super friendly staff and an amazing outdoor area." - Victoria P Close this module Newsletter Signup Receive exclusive offers, earlybird tickets to events and hear about new menu items before anyone else! name: The Monarch
homepage_content: The Monarch | Restaurant, Bar & Cafe | Pukekohe Home Welcome to The Monarch – Pukekohe’s Local Favourite Restaurant for 27 Years At The Monarch, we believe that dining out is about more than just delicious food and great drinks — it’s about creating lasting memories with the people you love. For over 27 years, we’ve been proud to be part of those moments, delivering experiences that feel special every time. From leisurely weekend brunches and casual weekday lunches to a seasonal dinner menu that’s always evolving, every dish we serve is made with passion and care. Whether you’re joining us for sun-soaked cocktails, a business lunch, a family gathering, or a romantic dinner for two, we’re here to make your visit unforgettable. Whatever the occasion, The Monarch is your place to relax, connect, and enjoy. “Food brings people together on many different levels. It’s nourishment of the soul and body; it’s truly love.” – Giada De Laurentiis. © The Monarch 2019 Welcome to the Monarch. Stay connected and up to date Follow us on Facebook

name: Waikiwi Tavern
homepage_content: Waikiwi Tavern – Invercargill’s real Kiwi Pub! about us Welcome to Waikiwi Tavern – your go-to kiwi pub for a fantastic time and mouthwatering eats! Our extensive menu is jam-packed with crowd pleasers, from the irresistible Open Steak Sandwich to the classic Bangers & Mash and the much-loved Chicken Parmi – there’s something to satisfy every craving. But the fun doesn’t stop there – we’ve got a wide selection of drinks to choose from and always something happening. Join us for a round of Jingo (musical bingo) during the week. Catch your favourite sports or races on our multiple TVs and make the most of our convenient self-service TAB facilities. We’ve got plenty of parking available, but if you’d rather not worry about the drive home, our courtesy coach service has got you covered – ensuring you reach your doorstep safely. For an authentic Kiwi Pub experience swing by the Waikiwi Tavern. We can’t wait to welcome you! name: Wadestown Chinese Takeaways
homepage_content: Wadestown Chinese Takeaways | Wadestown | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Wadestown Chinese Takeaways Asian - Chinese - 4.3 102 Wadestown Rd, Wadestown, Wellington 6012 × 顾客平均评分 4.3 Ordered some takeaway food for the family after a long week and it hit the spot. Great service and yummy food. Our favourite takeaways! I’m not sure how they got the double sautéed pork so succulent but it was perfect. The pork dim sim full of meat and again so tasty they didn’t last long as soon as we opened it. The potato fritters are made by hand and while crispy and crunchy on the outside the soft hot potato on the inside is a match made in heaven. Bonn appetite! Brad Sickler The owners Allan and Shuwen were so hospitable and down to earth with their amazing sense of humour and warm presence. If you've had the same thing, you can ask them what you feel like and they will make amazing recommendations on what to try. We got abit of a feast with orange chicken 🐔, seasonal warm vegetables, in-house made dumplings, twice cooked pork with there delicious sauce, crabsticks, yummy wonton and the BEST POTATO FRITTERS in the whole of Wellington! If you are looking for a place were the food is good and the banter is great too, you got to go see the boys over at Wadestown Chinese Takeaways! If you are wondering where the potato fritters are in the picture, I ate them before we even got home, but they are crispy little nuggets thst have fallen from heaven and made there way in to the Menu!!! You will be so happy to come here! 🤗😎😍👍 Ti Ai Great local specialist Chinese Takeaway service. Can recommend the Beef in Black-bean Sauce which is a favourite. Have also tried SZECHUAN STYLE - Beef (served with white rice). Plenty of options to explore. It said that the secrets in the sauce or is the sauce in the secret, we’re not sure but they have definitely got the sauce worked out. Two really good people, Allan & Shuwen are good to talk to. Do you speak Mandarin they do and they’re quite happy to hear a few words while you wait. Fish & Chips highly recommend but generally go for the Chinese menu. Order online, by phone or just turn up. Eelman Records TM New Zealand Great service. I asked them to take some ingredients out and they did it for me without hesitation. Food taste great ! Clapham Family in nz Been coming here for years. Brothers are friendly and they treat you well. Good local shop for your local Friday night fish and chips. name: Wang Wang Pancake
homepage_content: Wang Wang Pancake | Mount Eden | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Wang Wang Pancake Asian - Chinese - 4.3 704 Dominion Rd, Mount Eden, Auckland 1024 × Average Customer Rating 4.3 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ An Absolute Gem! Worth the Wait for Authentic Bliss.** I visited Wangwang Pancake on Father's Day 2025, and despite the expected chaos, it was a fantastic experience that absolutely lived up to the hype. This place is a genuine treasure on Dominion Road. Let's talk about the **service** first. Yes, it was incredibly busy—a testament to how popular this spot is—and yes, it did take a significant amount of time to get our food. However, this is where Wangwang shines in its fairness and communication. They have a brilliant system where orders are completed table-by-table. A simple glance at the order numbers on the board told us exactly how many tables were ahead of us. This transparency completely removes any frustration from the wait. You know you haven't been forgotten and that your turn is coming. The staff were hustling non-stop, managing a constant stream of both dine-in customers and a huge number of Hungry Panda delivery orders. They were efficient and focused, and we completely understood the pace given the special day. The **atmosphere** is exactly what you'd expect from a bustling, authentic eatery—it's vibrant, noisy, and not great. It's not a quiet, romantic fine-dining spot; it's a place where people come for seriously good food. The buzz of conversation, the sizzle from the kitchen, and the constant flow of delivery drivers create a lively and real environment. I also loved seeing the diverse mix of customers—from families celebrating Father's Day to groups of friends and, wonderfully, several Pākehā diners all enjoying the food. It’s a great sign of a place that transcends cultural boundaries and appeals to everyone who appreciates quality cuisine. Now, the main event: the **food**. It was nothing short of excellent and met every expectation. We ordered a variety of their signature pancake rolls and they were worth every minute of the wait. The pastry was perfectly flaky and layered, achieving that incredible crunch without being greasy. The fillings were generous, flavourful, and fresh. Each bite was a perfect combination of texture and taste. It's clear that everything is made to order with care, which is why it takes time. This isn't fast food; it's fresh, authentic Chinese street food made with skill. In summary, Wangwang Pancake is a must-visit. Manage your expectations: go knowing it might be busy and you'll need a little patience, but be assured that the system is fair and the payoff is immense. The food is spectacular, authentic, and worth every cent. I will absolutely be back, though maybe on a slightly less hectic day! Highly, highly recommend. Hao Very authentic Chinese wraps where you order the individual fillings and assemble your pancake. The flavours are good - a little oily but you can ask for a less salt and less oil. Generous portions at a reasonable and affordable price makes this a good option for sharing. They also have dumplings and Chinese breads. Recommended! Joy Wang Great food and well priced. Basic decor but it’s all about the food. Damian Arnold You'll love the tasty food at a great price here. The pancakes are filled with delicious veggies and meat. Even though the place is small and busy, the staff is super friendly, the place is clean and parking is a breeze. Augustine Tea This is one of our favourite place for lunch. It is a small place and usually quite crowded. Be early and you will get your table. Though small but sitting was pretty comfortable. Service was friendly and the food was good. The servings were reasonable and the prices were affordable. If you like some simple Chinese food, this may be the place for you. Food is consistently good. Good size main that we share. Love the papadoms nepalimeronaam 2013-07-06 20:14:44 Momo was wonderful. I felt eating in Nepal Julian Donald 2013-10-28 18:58:45 Horrible, sweet, no spice flavour at all! Louise Denton 2013-11-16 20:48:22 We have been to Everest many times - always for takeaways - and we have never had a bad meal from them. Tonight, we took some friends to dine in there. We have been raving about this place for ages, so we were a little nervous that it wouldn't be as good as we had said, but it was and then some. They are always so friendly and welcoming in there, and the food was, as always, simply beautiful. The vegetarian meals were amazing and the meat dishes were tender and flavourful. The naans were perfect - I cannot recommend the sweet naans enough - and don't get me started on the poppadoms. I usually hate poppadoms, not here! If you are looking for the best Indian in Christchurch, then you will find it at Everest Indian. David Harrow 2015-06-11 11:34:53 Great value for money and excellent food.... homepage_content: Adanaa Turkish Grill | New Lynn | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Adanaa Turkish Grill PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Adanaa Turkish Grill Order Online from Adanaa Turkish Grill Turkish Cuisine * 3120 Great North Rd New Lynn, Auckland 0600 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Fries $5.60 Chicken Doner Kebab Wrap $17.80 TOP SELLERS Fries $5.60 Chicken Doner Kebab Wrap $17.80 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 11:30am to 9:30pm Friday Closed 11:30am to 11:30pm Saturday Closed 11:30am to 11:30pm Sunday Closed 12:30pm to 9:30pm Monday Closed 11:30am to 9:30pm Tuesday Closed 11:30am to 9:30pm Wednesday Closed 11:30am to 9:30pm REVIEWS Thought we'd try Adanaa Turkish Takeaway tonight. Wasn't bad, quite a lot of salad and to a lesser extent rice, but not much chicken percentage wise.. Tasty but was a little bland, so overall an average experience. ELÆN Lamb and Chicken Shawarma's were on point and hot chips were a great side with it. Very lovely, friendly staff. Shop is small and homely but clean. Will definitely come back. Happy customer with two thumbs up😁 J Lau 2nd time there, I purchased the 20 dollar chicken pizza and the Lamb Kebab on rice with salad this time. Very much enjoyed the meal. Meat had good flavor and sauces I choose went well with the salad and rice. I loved the pizza, will be going back there, the mushrooms and the chicken worked very well for flavors. Friendly service and takes the time to make good food : ) I enjoy food that is good and more so when it actually fills your belly! Liam Tamaseu Good amounts of tasty food, nicely presented and great price for dine in. I really like the kebab on salad for a filling low-carb meal. While it's a takeaway, there is enough seating to eat with my family. Fish/chicken and chips also available for my kids and older folk. homepage_content: The Kebabs Hamilton | Order Kebab Online For Takeaways - Order Meal Kebab Burger Contact Us We will be opening 24/7 soon The Kebabs Hamilton The Kebabs Hamilton is a vibrant and popular restaurant located in the heart of Hamilton city. Specializing in delicious and authentic Middle Eastern cuisine, the restaurant is renowned for its mouthwatering kebabs, falafels, and flavorful grilled meats. The menu features a diverse range of options, including vegetarian and vegan dishes, catering to a wide array of tastes and preferences. At The Kebabs Hamilton, guests can expect a warm and inviting ambiance, perfect for casual dining with friends and family. The restaurant's skilled chefs use the finest and freshest ingredients to create dishes that are bursting with flavor, bringing the rich and aromatic taste of the Middle East to every plate. Whether you're craving a satisfying kebab wrap, a hearty platter of grilled meats, or a refreshing salad, The Kebabs Hamilton has something for everyone. With its excellent service and delightful culinary offerings, it has become a go-to destination for food enthusiasts seeking an authentic Middle Eastern dining experience in Hamilton. Specializing in both traditional and contemporary Indian cuisine, the menu offers a delightful range of dishes, from creamy butter chicken and flavorful lamb rogan josh to aromatic biryanis and freshly baked naan breads. Each dish is crafted with high-quality ingredients and a blend of spices that create a perfect balance of taste and heat, allowing customers to savor the true essence of Indian cuisine. Taste of India focuses on providing convenient and delicious takeaway service, ensuring that customers can enjoy their favorite meals wherever they choose. name: The Malt House Fusion
homepage_content: The Malt House fusion | Order Online For Takeaways - Order Meal Entree Mains Contact Us The Malt House Fusion WhangÄrei About Us The Malt House Fusion WhangÄrei is a renowned restaurant located in WhangÄrei, New Zealand. It is celebrated for its unique fusion cuisine, combining traditional flavors with modern culinary techniques. The restaurant's name, "The Malt House," reflects its emphasis on malt-based beverages such as craft beers and whiskies, which are carefully paired with the diverse menu offerings. The restaurant's interior exudes a warm and inviting atmosphere, with rustic yet contemporary decor, creating an ideal setting for a memorable dining experience. The friendly and knowledgeable staff provide attentive service, ensuring that guests feel welcome and well taken care of throughout their visit. Bound to challenge everything you think you know about cocktails, this list contains traditional favourites spiced up with new world techniques. Malt House presents an innovative selection of curated cocktails to create unforgettable experiences. Our mixologists are well versed in the classics. If you have a favourite, feel free to go off menu. We've categorised our cocktails by style to make it as easy as possible for you to choose your perfect drink. Order Online Reservation Table reservation offers several benefits to both the customers and the restaurant. For customers, it ensures they have a guaranteed place to dine, especially during peak hours or busy periods, minimizing waiting times. It also allows them to plan their outings or special occasions with confidence. 094383771 Book your table online or call us on 094383771 Contact Info 62 Walton Street, WhangÄrei 0110, New Zealand 094383771 Opening Hours Monday: Closed Tuesday To Sunday: 12â11:30pm Order Online

name: Alfie's Spit Roast Catering
homepage_content: Home - Breeze Spit Roast Your ultimate spit roast catering experience See our menu options Let Breeze Spit Roast take care of the food on your special day If you are planning a wedding, birthday, Christmas party, or an event of any kind, Breeze Spit Roast has the perfect buffet-style menu for you and your guests. Kayla and her team excel at cooking meats. Only the best cuts are selected, then Manuka smoked in the spit roaster for maximum flavour and tenderness. Breeze Spit Roast has the perfect solution for any occasion with delicious buffet-style spit roast packages and beautifully roasted meats. Do you like the sound of crackled pork, roast beef, marinated chicken, and delicious lamb with mint sauce, served with fresh salads and all the trimmings? Breeze Spit Roast is here to serve the tastiest food and take the stress out of your event catering. See our menu options The Breeze Spit Roast Story Since 2015, Kayla and her team have been trusted to provide the best spit roasts in Whangarei and Northland, catering for any kind of special event. Formally known as Alfies Spit Roast for a decade, the company was renamed Breeze Spit Roast and Catering in April 2025. Breeze Spit Roast can handle any size function, from 30 people up to 300+. Committed to ensuring none of your guests leave hungry and everyone enjoys the spit roast buffet experience, Kayla will make your event extra special with melt-in-your-mouth roast meals. Catering for special occasions Based in Whangarei, Breeze Spit Roast can provide catering with fabulous food options, with or without dessert, for weddings, events and special occasions Northland-wide. For larger events, the Breeze Spit Roast team would be more than happy to travel south. Ask us more Great menus at affordable prices The meats we serve are all excellent cuts, smoked to perfection in our spit roaster and well-seasoned with our signature herbs and sauces. Served buffet-style with an array of fresh salads and sides, you and your guests will love the experience. See the options Our professional and friendly team Our catering staff are friendly, experienced, and well trained to make your event catering a success. Presentation, professionalism and efficiency are the important components of our spit roast catering service, alongside the freshest and yummiest food. Talk to Kayla today Why Choose Breeze Spit Roast & Catering? Kayla and her team at Breeze Spit Roast pour aroha into everything they do. Every care is taken to make the most of the delicious flavours of the best meat cuts and the other high-quality seasonal ingredients. With full dedication and commitment to providing a great customer experience, you can count on receiving the real deal for your wedding, birthday, corporate function or other special event. Book your event Breeze Spit Roast & Catering offers a friendly and professional service, ensuring your special occasion is an experience to remember. Enquire now

homepage_content: Bays Takeaway | Island Bay | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Bays Takeaway PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Bays Takeaway Order Online from Bays Takeaway Chinese Takeaway * 138 The Parade Island Bay, Wellington 6023 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Chips Homemade $6.70 Fish $6.70 TOP SELLERS Chips Homemade $6.70 Fish $6.70 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 12pm to 9pm Friday Closed 12pm to 9pm Saturday Closed 12pm to 9pm Sunday Closed 12pm to 9pm Monday Closed Closed Tuesday Closed 12pm to 9pm Wednesday Closed 12pm to 9pm REVIEWS So far my top best fish and chips in Welly. The first time I tried it for sure I will order again. Then I ordered again, again. Influenced my friends too😊 Friendly staffs. Btw, they have big portion sizes for fried chicken too. Dina D explorer First time here. We ordered Singapore noodles, fried rice and Beef with black pepper sauce. Was told it will be ready in 30min, they were ready in 20min. Phone was ringing non-stop and people were coming in and out, very busy take away. The food itself was good. Portion was large. Will visit again. Wilko Jack 30/4/23 - On mission in the Southern burbs to hit up Island Bays crowning jewel. Meal: Fish n Chips and potato fritters Total cost: $12.40 Not off to an ideal start as I thought I ordered a paua fritter but got two potato fritters 🤦🏽‍♂️ Anywho… Fish - (Warehou) nice large fillet with a great crust on it. A tad bit greasy but that didn’t detract from the beautiful tasting fillet. Fillet was clean and fresh and boardering on melt in your mouth territory! Chips - Hand Cut!!! Cooked well with a nice bite and soft on the inside! Portion size was generous. Took with me two pieces of buttered bread with Best Foods mayo which was an excellent accompaniment to the fish and hand cut chips! The chips were damn near perfect! Well worth the Sunday drive out from Petone! The shop is right next to the Island Bay bar. There is a car park and access from the back of the shop. Mark Panapa Indulged myself to fish and chips for Xmas treat. The fish of the day was Warehou, a decent size compared to other shops and crumbed nicely. However the chips were no longer than 2" in length appearing to be cheaper ends/offcuts. A decent length chip would be nicer to savour the flavour. homepage_content: Best Turkish Food Company | Christchurch Central City | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Best Turkish Food Company Turkish - 4.3 138 Hereford St, Christchurch Central City, Christchurch 8011 × Average Customer Rating 4.3 It is a solid option and might be the best Turkish food in the CBD. It’s a shame that kebabs and meat with chips are more expensive than they used to be, but that’s more of a general comment. The meat and sauce options here are as good as any. A solid choice overall. The peking duck is a great value at $60, but you do need to order it 1 hour in advance. They serve the best salty egg yolk green beans, and the homemade pancake is huge and a fantastic value at $8. We brought my parents here when they visited NZ and they loved all the dishes we ordered. Highly recommended! Update: came back again and the food was excellent! The chef is very consistent in his cooking which we appreciate, as not all chinese restaurants are consistent and you never know what you're gonna get. Not here! The free jasmine tea is enjoyable as it's not too strong, not too weak (the owner says she buys the tea leaves from a specialty shop). The 20% off promotion is still available! Daisy Lu A chef sliced a duck right in front of us, which was great because we could clearly see what we were eating. The price was reasonable, and the food was absolutely delicious. Highly recommend this place! Kelly지혜 So underrated! This is the best value Peking Duck in Auckland. You do need to call ahead and order for the duck but it is worth it. The other mains are also super tasty and portion sizes are huge. The food comes out pretty fast. Very authentic- my Chinese families favourite place. The interior is quite bare but it’s worth overlooking for the food. Annabelle “Annie Q” Q If you’re craving Beijing duck, you definitely have to visit this place. The owner is from Beijing, so the taste is truly authentic. It gave me a real taste of home, even in a foreign country. I’m really grateful. Jimmy Zhang Excellent Peking duck and amazing hot food dishes. The chef comes out to carve the duck at the table as part of a dinner and show. Morgan Platt First time here, I ordered a Teriyaki Tofu Don (rice bowl) - being vegetarian I am limited when it comes to decent amount of Japanese food so this is my regular go-to order. However it was VERY disappointing so 70% of it ended up in the rubbish. Need to pick up your game guys! I think I'll stick to St Pierre's Sushi + Bento Bowl for now.. ❤️ Shyam Amarsee

name: Castlepoint Hotel & Guesthouse
homepage_content: Castlepoint Menu Home Accommodation Gallery Book Now Fun Times Food Privacy Policy Contact Us Castlepoint Welcome to The Castlepoint Hotel or as the locals call it " The Whakataki ". Whakataki translated from Te Reo means Introduction. We are your "Introduction to the sea" Where history abounds and the natural wonders of Castlepoint will excite you. The welcome is warm, the beer is cold and the destination is as big as the journey. We are open - Tuesday - Thursday 3pm till late Friday to Sunday from 11am till late Stay a while in our relaxed comfortable accommodation and enjoy our good ol' Kiwi hospitality. Surf the breaks, dive for Paua & Crayfish, play a round of golf, try your hand at tennis, walk for miles along the beach, wander the hills, take a bike ride, surfcast off the beach, swim in the lagoon, visit our iconic lighthouse and bring your camera to capture those special memories of this special place. The surf is a short walk from the hotel and Castlepoint is 5km down the road or less along the beach. See you soon! Castlepoint. © Copyright Castlepoint Hotel & Guesthouse - Site map Phone: +64 63726747 Masterton 5889 Website Builder - Website World

name: Chapati Indian Restaurant
homepage_content: Chapati Indian Restaurant Henderson | Dine in and Takeaway Order Online for Takeaway and Delivery View Our Takeaway and Dine in Menu Our restaurants are fully licensed, plus BYO wine only. Buffet $30 Saturday *Terms & Condition Apply Entree Mains Desserts Drinks Welcome to Chapati Indian Restaurant, Henderson Auckland – Dine in and Takeaway Traditionally the thing to serve with curries, is either Chapati (Roti) or Naan instead of bread and it would be true to say that most homes in India still make their daily batch of fresh Chapatis. Chapati is unleavened bread made of either white flour orunsifted meal with a little shortening, but instead of being baked they are toasted over a griddle till they are freckled gold. To see a freshly stacked pile of Chapatis is a sight that will tempt any age group, and many a child has snatched one whilst mother is not looking. Come right in ……and join us in an exciting culinary journey which is a result of centuries of patronage to the art of cooking and a large repertoire of delicious recipes. We proudly share with you all the flavours and subtle nuances of authentic Indian cuisine so you may nurture a fond intimacy with our cuisine. For your best dining experience, each dish is individually prepared to ensure freshness and quality. Food delivery and takeaway available for Glen Eden, Henderson, Henderson Valley, Massey, Ranui, Swanson, Te Atatu Peninsula, Te Atatu South, West Harbour and Westgate in Henderson Auckland. Click here to order food online or ring us on 09 836 0218.

homepage_content: Blue Adriatic Roast Takeaway | Mount Roskill | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Blue Adriatic Roast Takeaway Roast - 4.4 220 Richardson Rd, Mount Roskill, Auckland 1041 × 顾客平均评分 4.4 We had chicken nibbles, chicken thighs, chips and pork roast meal. Everything was so tasty. I agree with the other reviewers that the chicken nibbles are one of a kind. Full of flavor. My partner and I also enjoyed the roast pork and the pork cracklings were to die for! The roast vegetables were also delicious. The chips were crispy and nicely seasoned with chicken salt. The 2 servers were also really nice in person and over the phone when I ordered. E S Reyes This is the only restaurant where we can get everything at a very reasonable price. Thank you so much for the great service! I’m a regular customer and always satisfied. Sunil Shrestha This shop serves the most delicious chicken nibbles, chips, and roast pork—always fresh, flavorful, and perfectly cooked. The environment is clean, pleasant, and inviting. Highly recommended! Ranjan Mainali Best food and excellent customer service. The staffs are super friendly and make you feel very welcome. Highly recommended! Shritika Shrestha The roast meals are always good especially the roast pork meal and that pork crackling is fire! The hot chips, fried chicken and chicken nibbles are some of the best in Auckland! Service is great too except sometimes a grumpy lady behind the counter who can't take a joke and also when they say the hot chips will take "7 minutes" but it takes double that! (NOTE: I am describing my interaction with the previous owners, not the current new owners who were running the shop the week before Christmas 2023). name: Collective Coffee Shop&Co
homepage_content: Collective Coffee | Coffee Shop Wellington top of page 26 Panama Street Wellington At Collective Coffee we celebrate the idea of ‘gathering’ and collaboration At Collective Coffee we celebrate the idea of ‘gathering’ and collaboration. We celebrate simplicity. A simple smile and hello and simple and delicious fare to nourish your body. We gather produce from our collaborators and create beautifully crafted food and drinks. We offer you a safe and relaxing environment to rest, ponder and gather your thoughts. ​ Our Menu Our regularly changing menu reflects the best ingredients of the season. Freshly made sandwiches, pastries, muffins and other sweet treats are perfect for a light lunch or a quick bite. We serve refreshing juices, matcha, and coffee. ​ Our Collaborators Sandwiches, muffins, scones, and cookies from our friends at Astoria Espresso & Wine Bar Pastries from Wellington Sourdough Matcha from Thea Tea from T-Leaf Juices from Most Juice Coffee (hot and cold) from Flight Coffee Our interior is designed by Allistar Cox, and our menu by Michael Pearson. Our identity is crafted by Creature. Our Location We’re located in Wellington CBD. We’re collaborating and sharing space with the WCC Public Library Te Whare Pukapuka o Te Awe on Brandon / Panama Streets. bottom of page

name: Cinta Malaysian â€“ Shortland Street
homepage_content: Malaysian Restaurant Auckland | Best Malaysian Food - CBD & West Skip to content ORDER ONLINE BOOK A TABLE Order Online Book a Table A TRUE MALAYSIAN DINING EXPERIENCE Albany - Table Reservation Albany - Order Online Auckland CBD - Order Online Albany - Order online Albany - Table Reservation Westgate - Order online Westgate - Table Reservation Immerse yourself in the flavour and taste that is Cinta Malaysian Restaurant Culinary delights from the heart of Malaysia. Share a true Malaysian restaurant dining experience with your friends and family. Cinta has a fantastic wine selection & tailored menu to suit your individual taste and cultural needs. Cinta uses authentic spices sourced directly from Malaysia and the freshest produce here in New Zealand. Cinta strives to share our passion for delicious, exotic, spicy, sweet and sour Malaysian food served in a friendly and relaxed atmoshphere. WE’RE PASSIONATE ABOUT Malaysian Food Invite your friends, family or business out to share a true Malaysian dining experience with Cinta. Group bookings available as well as private room reservations along side a tailored menu and a fantastic wine selection. We’re open 7 days a week. Monday to Friday 10.30am – 9:30pm, Saturday and Sunday 5.00pm-9.30pm. EXPLORE OUR Delicious Menus MAIN MENU TAKEWAY MENU DRINKS MENU Coming Soon! UNIQUE AND DELICIOUS Malaysian Dishes Our unique Malaysian dishes are created from locally sourced fresh produce with our authentic dry spices imported directly from Malaysia. Our tailored menu including vegetarian options has something for everyone. Suitable for friends, family or business – enjoy a very personable Malaysian dining experience with large group and private room bookings available. WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY... We ate here in late November and I they managed to get a table for us at short notice as the restaurant was fully booked. The food is probably the best I have eaten in Auckland for some time and the service was excellent. We had a variety of entrees, main courses and fried rice and everything was so delicious. DEBORAH H. Excellent food & excellent service. Amy & her staff will take excellent care of you during your visit. Very friendly & accommodating. The flavours are amazing & variety of dishes excellent. Butter prawns fantastic. CAMERON B. We know live on the skirts of Auckland but this was one of our favourite haunts. Went with our friends pre-Xmas. Food was delicious. Favourites include butter prawns, Singapore noodles, cumin lamb, lemon chicken and the garlic beans were to die for. Wonderful staff, wonderful food, not disappointed. Zeng Seng Kee This is an authentic Chinese restaurant. 🫶 We’ve tried the “choose your own ingredients” on the display fridge. The clay pot rice was impressive. We hadn't had clay pot rice in a long time, and it was up to true local standards. The malatang was very tasty, with a wonderfully creamy soup. name: Cotto Restaurant
homepage_content: Auckland's Food and Drink Hotspots – Eat, Sip, Repeat From Hidden Gems to Iconic Favorites for Food Lovers Welcome to Auckland’s ultimate restaurant guide , where we bring you the city’s best restaurants, from world-renowned establishments to local hotspots serving up unforgettable flavours. From waterfront brunches and innovative fine dining to craft cocktails in cosy bars, our handpicked selections will navigate you through the city’s burgeoning food scene. Let’s dive into Auckland’s most delicious hotspots ! Where to Eat: Auckland’s Must-Try Food Spots Auckland is a food lover’s paradise, offering a wide range of flavours, top-rated eateries, and hidden culinary gems. From fine dining to cosy neighbourhood favourites, the city serves everything from fusion dishes to authentic international cuisine, with endless lunch options and delicious breakfast choices to kickstart the day. For those with a sweet tooth, Auckland’s bakeries offer artisan bread, flaky croissants, and mouthwatering pastries for a perfect treat anytime. Where to Drink: Auckland’s Best Cafés and Bars Auckland’s drinking scene offers something for every occasion, whether you’re enjoying a relaxed afternoon tea or a night out with friends. Sports bars across the city provide the perfect setting for watching live games, indulging in pub-style food, and soaking up the lively atmosphere. For a more refined experience, high tea offers a selection of teas, finger sandwiches, and pastries, while expert bartenders mix top-quality cocktails with local ingredients and rooftop bars to let you enjoy stunning views of the city skyline. Savour the Local Taste: Auckland’s Real Food Experience New Zealand’s food culture is deeply rooted in tradition and local produce, with Auckland offering the perfect opportunity to experience it. Traditional Māori dishes, like hāngī, rewena bread, and seafood delicacies, highlight the country’s indigenous culinary heritage. For a taste of fresh, locally sourced ingredients, Auckland’s farmers’ markets are a must-visit, featuring everything from organic vegetables to artisanal cheeses, showcasing the best of the region’s farm-to-table flavours. Food and Drink Blog: Auckland’s Hottest Trends Be in the know about the newest tendencies and must-have experiences in New Zealand’s lively food and beverage landscape, from leading chefsexperimenting with new techniques to local products. Indulge in the depth of flavours of New Zealand, such as indigenous herbs and world-class seafood, and have fun during seasonal events such as strawberry picking in Auckland. Beer enthusiasts can discover the craft beer scene , and dog owners can look for dog-friendly cafés that serve great coffee and have a welcoming atmosphere for you and your dog. Start Your Auckland Food and Drink Adventure Internal information on secrets, near-future events, and seasonal specials. Uncover the ultimate food and drink experience in Auckland . Whether you’re craving haute cuisine, a bite on the run, or the perfect place to order a drink, Auckland has it all. Use this guide to find the city’s top food and drink spots and sample the fare that has made New Zealand the food destination of choice. For more insights, you can visit Heart of the City . Begin the culinary journey! With its thriving food scene, breathtaking places, and passionate foodie chefs who share your food obsession, Auckland will become an unmatchable food destination soon enough. From award-winning restaurants to late-night comfort food, the city food scene has it all and caters to all tastes. Whether you feel the urge for your favourite type of food or drink, Auckland’s multicultural and dynamic food scene has something for everyone.

name: The Turmeric Cuisine of India | Indian Restaurant Napier
homepage_content: The Turmeric Cuisine of India Napier | Indian Takeaway & Dine-In at Ahuriri, Napier The Turmeric Cuisine of India Napier Order Online The Turmeric Cuisine of India Napier Order Online About Us The Turmeric Cuisine of India Napier The Turmeric Cuisine of India, nestled at 14 West Quay in the scenic Ahuriri district of Napier, New Zealand, offers a delightful journey through the rich tapestry of Indian flavors. Renowned for its authentic dishes and warm hospitality, this restaurant has become a cherished spot for both locals and visitors seeking genuine Indian cuisine. Upon entering, guests are welcomed into a cozy and inviting ambiance, where the aroma of spices sets the stage for a memorable dining experience. The menu boasts a diverse selection, from beloved classics like butter chicken and chicken tikka masala to regional specialties such as methi chicken and chole bhature. Vegetarian options, including malai kofta and daal tadka, are also prominently featured, ensuring a dish to satisfy every palate For those preferring to dine at home, The Turmeric Cuisine of India offers convenient online ordering and delivery services, bringing the taste of India straight to your doorstep. Whether you're in the mood for a hearty meal or a light snack, this establishment promises a culinary adventure that captures the essence of Indian gastronomy. Try Our Services Entree The entrÃ©es at Turmeric Cuisine of India are flavorful, well-portioned, beautifully presented, and rich with authentic Indian spices. Order Online Order Online Mains Rich, aromatic, and flavorful, the main curries are perfectly spiced, tender, and bursting with authentic Indian taste in every bite. Order Online Order Online Drinks The Turmeric Cuisine of India offers traditional Indian drinks like mango lassi, masala chai, and refreshing soft drinks . Annie served us with a smile, was excellent at communicating the menu and what kinds of food would suit us, the food was delicious and fresh, best chefs. Nicole Lawrence

It's a great idea and it was very yummy. A number of side dishes are included in the all you can eat menu as well. Stephen Infield First time trying the ‘all you can eat’ with family who have previously visited. Each flavour of chicken wad delicious!! My favourite was the wasabi mayo & original. Great value for $35pp (I didn’t managed to get pics of the other sides). Definitely will be coming back, very fast service and friendly staff 🥰 Montana Karsey I had an incredible dining experience at China Beach! The food was absolutely delicious — authentic flavours and perfectly cooked dishes that left me wanting more. What truly made the visit special, though, was the outstanding service provided by a young man named Jamie. He was attentive, friendly, (and attractive) and made sure everything was perfect throughout the meal. Jamie’s warm and professional approach added a wonderful touch to the whole experience. I highly recommend China Beach to anyone looking for fantastic Chinese cuisine paired with top-notch service. Five stars all the way - Cooper Cooper10x1 Tofts We went for the all you can eat chicken The chicken was really nicely cooked, crispy coating, chicken perfectly cooked. It's noted the chicken is all the same, just different sauces or coating - beware the honey soy- extremely salty! The service was average at best, long delays between dishes, no explanation on what to expect or how to order, items missing etc. Ambiance is what is missing most. The restaurant area is functional, but it lacks personality and warmth and leaves you feeling a bit like a perching short stay visitor. Adjusting the lighting and investing in staff performance could see this average restaurant reach new heights and popularity. L R Ordered Chicken Chop Suey, and the Mongolian Beef. Plus some sides. The dishes were 10 stars, loads of flavour, and a nice difference between them to really showcase the chefs skills. Good ratio of meat to vege, and the bok choy in the chicken dish was a fantastic alternative to the usual,cheap celery that many others use and no one likes. The chicken was nicely sized too, so you got a good balance between the sauce in the dish, and the actual flavour of the chicken, which was really well done, and not soggy from baking soda like other restaurants do. My daughter raved over the spring rolls, the best she has had. The only let down, and maybe room for improvement, was the won tons, they didn't seem to have any filling, and appeared to simply be a folded over piece of pastry, the photo showing the size next to my fork, so just won't order those again, especially for the price. But still 5 stars and I look forward to going there and eating in to try the other dishes. name: Curry Twist Masterton
homepage_content: Curry Twist Skip to the content Close Menu 437 Queen Street, Masterton 5810 Ph: 06-370-3659 Order now To appreciate this rich and varied cuisine one must understand the philosophy that dictates Indian food. We want to express our message through food, by passionately cooking traditionally and nutritionally balanced Indian Cuisine. name: Wellesbourne Homestay B&B
homepage_content: Wellesbourne Homestay B&B - Hotel in Palmerston North Wellesbourne Homestay B&B 🌎 5 Wellesbourne Street, 4410 Palmerston North, New Zealand Book a room Arrival Departure Adults 1 2 3 4 5 6 Children 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 Check Availability Wellesbourne Homestay B&B offers accommodations in Palmerston North, a 13-minute walk from Palmerston North City Council and 1.3 miles from Foodstuffs. The bed and breakfast, set in a building dating back to 1922, features free Wifi and free private parking. Massey University is 3.3 miles from the bed and breakfast, and Hopkirk Research Institute is 3.5 miles away. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies. At the bed and breakfast, units include a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Buffet and continental breakfast options with pancakes, fruit, and juice are available each morning at the bed and breakfast. Popular points of interest near Wellesbourne Homestay B&B include Palmerston North Convention Centre, Arena Manawatu, and Universal College of Learning. Palmerston North International Airport is 2.5 miles from the property. Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.0 for a two-person trip. name: Beeji Dhaba - Dhaba On Highway
homepage_content: Beeji Dhaba Victoria Street | Dhaba On Highway Frankton | View Our Menu - Order Meal Welcome To Beeji Dhaba 587 Victoria Street, Hamilton Central, Hamilton 3204, New Zealand Order online call us 07 464 0146 Welcome To Dhaba On Highway 587 Victoria Street, Hamilton Central, Hamilton 3204, New Zealand Order online call us 07 974 0022 About Beeji Dhaba Beeji Dhaba at 587 Victoria Street, Hamilton Central, Hamilton, is a charming spot that brings the rich, heartwarming flavors of traditional Indian cuisine to New Zealand. Inspired by the age-old culinary traditions of North India, Beeji Dhaba offers a welcoming atmosphere where the essence of homemade Indian meals takes center stage. This cozy eatery is known for its mouthwatering dishes, from the sizzling tandoori platters to creamy curries, all crafted with fresh ingredients and a careful balance of spices. Whether you're in the mood for buttery naans, aromatic biryanis, or tangy street food favorites like chaat, Beeji Dhaba promises a memorable dining experience. Beeji Dhaba is perfect for casual meals, takeaways, and even small gatherings, where the warmth of Indian hospitality makes every visit special. Whether you're craving a quick snack or a hearty meal, this dhaba-style restaurant is a go-to destination for anyone seeking a taste of home-style Indian cooking in the heart of Hamilton. homepage_content: Amici Italian cafe and restaurant | Order Taste of Itlay Online in Whangarei - Order Meal Dessert Menu "EntrÃ©es Crafted with Passion, Delight in Every Bite." Contact Us "Contact Us: Your Questions, Our Answers." Amici Italian Cafe and Restaurant Nestled in the heart of Whangarei, down bustling Quality Street, Amici is a charming eatery serving an extensive Italian menu to cater for all throughout brunch, lunch, dinner, Pizzeria and dessert When does a restaurant become more than just a place to just get something to eat? When does eating out become a great experience? At Amiciâs, we strive to be YOUR favourite Local authentic Italian restaurant. Food is at the heart of our mission. From the Italian classics, to our one-of-a-kind spiced Italian favourites, all of our offerings are handcrafted from the finest, freshest ingredients available. Whether youâre craving Italian comfort food like our Ravioli, Pappardelle or something with a little more spice like our signature Fettuccine Carbonara, Amiciâs has something for everyone. We revere the tradition of serving only the best, and when it means coming in early to hand-roll the meatballs, build a layered Lasagna one layer at a time, or craft our tiramisu from scratch, we think of it as passion, not work. And while we are most proud of the Italian classics, itâs our one-of-a-kind, signature spicy dishes that really get us excited! A little something we call Spiced Italian. Our Pastas, Gourmet Pizzas, and pizza Garlic Bread have been some of our more popular dishes since we first opened our doors. So whether you love the classics, or the spice, it will always be fresh and handmade to order at Amici plus we have a range of desserts, nibble or simply a casual wine or coffee, â Amici will happily welcome you. With an expansive terrace, featuring a classic tranquil fountain, and a warm interior with a cozy fireplace, the restaurant is suitable rain or shine â all year round. We also cater for Gluten free, Vegan, Dairy free. Heather Murphy Formally Dragonboat, it was wonderful to see the restaurant open on Saturday night. Special mention for Felix, who always remembers us (and our favourite drinks). An absolute credit to the business and hospitality industry. Much loved Chinese restaurant for Asian flight crews. Very well deserved. Booking for large groups is recommended as most of the larger tables were reserved. Sally W A good Chinese spot in the city centre, this has been an established place to come and eat since the 90s. I came here for Yum Cha recently with a group of work colleagues and enjoyed myself. The food was nice and the restaraunt is presentable enough. My only critic is that it is a older restaraunt and could use some new life breathed into it (new decor or new food flavours). T Ordered a lunch special which also came with an egg tart and soup. Ordered additional rolled steam like noodles rolls with beef which are very nice. The duck and pork rice a , the crispy skin on the pork wasn’t exactly crispy but the taste was still nice. Service from the place was great and friendly and has the thumbs up definitely. Didn’t eat inside the restaurant but there it by a food court sitting area and I found that pleasant with the different music playing by the mall. John Truong × × - + ADD 0 ATTENTION × Are you sure you want to place this order for tomorrow? name: Gengis Khan International Mongolian Bbq Buffet
homepage_content: Gengy's Mongolian BBQ Buffet Restaurant top of page HISTORY OF GENGY'S The theme of Gengy’s is originated from the founder of the Mongol Empire who had invaded and conquered most of Europe, Asia and Africa with his warriors. After they had won a battle they had a huge victory feast in the shelter using their shields turn upside down over roaring camp fires and cook newly discovered meats and vegetables native to the conquered lands. Gengy’s restaurants have captured the idea of this fresh and tasty style of cuisine, and approached them in more modern and hygienic style. Come and discover our food! It was mouth-watering experience. Broth was rich in flavour and portion was huge. Good for 2 I guess but I was so hungry that time I was able to finish all. Parking was on the back. Church corner market area. Arvin Daniel Fair price. Big portion in every dishes. Tastes good. There is a black hair young lady treat mandarin- speaking customers so mean and poker face. Other waiters are nice. So weird that treat other people better than our own ethnicity…. Vi J I was looking for dinner around 9 after the long drive from Dunedin. This was one of the few places staying open (they close at 1 in the morning). It doesn't look like much from the outside, but they were very welcoming, there was a nice buzz from the other diners - it was about 2/3 full. It seems to be a good solid place - decent food, well priced and enough of it. I had the beef brisket and noodles - beef was tender, the veg had a good crunch to them, broth was lovely. The noodles were, I think, too soft - they offered no resistance. barry allan I can have dimsum at dinner time there which is quite happy for us. Even taste much better than I thought, but the deep fried pork ribs were a little bit salty. Sorry. Helpful waitress. Served Fast. Also they open late. Will visit again to try other dishes. name: Fedup Restaurant and Takeaway
homepage_content: Fed Up Restaurant & Takeaway | Paraparaumu Beach | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox Welcome to Fed Up Restaurant & Takeaway PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Fed Up Restaurant & Takeaway Order Online from Fed Up Restaurant & Takeaway * 40 Marine Parade Paraparaumu Beach, Paraparaumu 5032 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Chips $6.00 Battered Fish $6.00 TOP SELLERS Chips $6.00 Battered Fish $6.00 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 11am to 8pm Friday Closed 11am to 8pm Saturday Closed 11am to 8pm Sunday Closed 11am to 8pm Monday Closed 11am to 8pm Tuesday Closed 11am to 8pm Wednesday Closed 11am to 8pm REVIEWS I've been stopping in for meals over the past few years and I wanted something to eat on a trip back home so called in and decided rather than having a meal, I would just get something to take away. Settled on a fishburger and whilst crumbed fish isn't my preference (it is possible it can be made with battered fish instead of crumbed but I didn't ask) the burger was fresh and well presented with salad and a slice of cheese. The food from Fed Up is consistently good and I recommend you try it. S W Amazing fish and chips. Very big portions and fresh! Great chips! Corn fritter and spring roll was yum! Fish was fresh and crispy batter. My favourite fish and chips place. Shareen Smyth Loved it, food freshly made. Perfect amount of salad and chips and sauce. Fish was so tasty and not oily as some places tend to do. We had the blue cod in crumbs meal which i can highly recommend. Prices were great too so we went twice in one week 😀 dine in or takeaway - Great picnic spot across the road in front of Kapiti Island. Lili vanZ Such great quality and freshness. I had teraki dinner box. Absolutely delicious. And only $25 incl an L&P. Great value in my opinion...especially coming from Melbourne. I wish they were local to me lol Mark Dickens The fish was absolutely phenomenal. Very reasonable pricing and HUGE portions. They don't have paper towels to wash your hands in the bathroom but just grab take away and walk 50 feet over to the beach and it's perfect. If you want fish and chips this is the spot. name: Chaska Indian Restaurant Otahuhu
homepage_content: Chaska Indian Restaurant ÅtÄhuhu & Takanini | Authentic Indian Cuisine in Auckland Welcome to Chaska Indian Restaurant 62 Atkinson Avenue, ÅtÄhuhu, Auckland 1062, New Zealand Order Online Welcome to Chaska Takanini 29/108 Great South Road, Takanini order online About Chaska Indian Restaurant Chaska Indian Restaurant, nestled at 62 Atkinson Avenue in ÅtÄhuhu, Auckland, beckons diners on a culinary journey through the vibrant flavors of India. Set in the heart of Auckland, this culinary gem offers an authentic Indian dining experience like no other. Step into the warm and inviting ambiance, where the aroma of exotic spices fills the air, and be greeted by friendly staff ready to ensure a memorable dining experience. Chaska takes pride in its diverse menu, featuring a delectable array of traditional Indian dishes crafted with the finest ingredients and authentic techniques. From fragrant biryanis to sizzling tandoori delights, each dish is a testament to the rich culinary heritage of India. Whether you're craving the fiery kick of a vindaloo or the creamy indulgence of a butter chicken, Chaska has something to satisfy every palate. With its convenient location in ÅtÄhuhu, Chaska Indian Restaurant is the perfect destination for a cozy dinner with loved ones, a celebration with friends, or a casual meal to tantalize your taste buds. Come experience the essence of India right here in Auckland. About Chaska Takanini At Chaska Takanini, we bring you the authentic taste of India, right here in the heart of Takanini. Located at 29/108 Great South Road, our restaurant is dedicated to offering a memorable dining experience that combines traditional Indian flavors with warm hospitality. Our chefs are passionate about crafting dishes that celebrate the richness and diversity of Indian cuisine. From fragrant curries and sizzling tandoori delights to freshly baked naan and mouthwatering street-style specialties, every meal is prepared with fresh ingredients, aromatic spices, and lots of love. Whether you are craving a comforting butter chicken, spicy vindaloo, or a vegetarian favorite, we have something to satisfy every palate. At Chaska Takanini, we believe dining is more than just food â itâs about creating moments. Thatâs why weâve created a welcoming space where families, friends, and food lovers can come together to enjoy a delicious meal in a relaxed atmosphere. name: Forbidden City Restaurant
homepage_content: Forbidden City Restaurant | Lower Hutt | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Forbidden City Restaurant PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Forbidden City Restaurant Order Online from Forbidden City Restaurant Chinese * 44 Queens Dr Lower Hutt 5010 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS 30. Steamed Rice $3.00 8. Pan Fried Dumplings (6 Pcs) $12.00 TOP SELLERS 30. Steamed Rice $3.00 8. Pan Fried Dumplings (6 Pcs) $12.00 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup LUNCH DINNER Thursday 11:30am to 2:30pm 5pm to 9:30pm Friday 11:30am to 2:30pm 5pm to 9:30pm Saturday 11:30am to 2:30pm 5pm to 9:30pm Sunday Closed 5pm to 9:30pm Monday Closed 5pm to 9:30pm Tuesday 11:30am to 2:30pm 5pm to 9:30pm Wednesday 11:30am to 2:30pm 5pm to 9:30pm REVIEWS A nice place in the lower hutt city to try out authentic Chinese food. Specially a halal menu. Can accommodate different group sizes. Would be a nice place to hang around with friends and family. Food was superb and delicious and I visited second time as well. Beijing roast duck was amazing and I tried it for the first time. Dumplings tasted well. We tried out many dishes there and did not regret of ordering and tasting for the first time. Definitely recommend and worth visiting many times to taste the food since they consistently maintain the same level of quality. Shafwana Shafeek This restaurant has giving me a great curiosity and challenged me to have a lunch here: 1. Why someone named a restaurant a FORBIDDEN CITY? It's very COOL like a movie title, but it's not. 2. It have a neon sign when open, even in the afternoon. It's weird but interesting for me! 3. the interior was not very inviting but at the same time very authentic?? 4. And then.. Serving an authentic chinese peking duck as a recommended menu?? 5. Some of the so-called Halal food wasn't leave a good impressions but okay I give it a try. I came with my wife on her birthday because she's craving peking duck from a long time, and we growing curiosity in this restaurant together. We ordered Roasted duck and Corn soup. The soup arrived first. My impressions is positive. The flavour was balanced. When you put some soy sauce and chilli oil, it hits different!! It was very perfect because we eating when outside is rainy so it warm our mouth, head and body. The roasted pecking duck became our "main course", along with the rice. We are very overwhelmed with the flavour. It's juicy, delicious, crispy skin... We could never want anything more than this!! The last bite still feel it's was first bite.. What an experience. When we finished and wanna pay, I never expected this: they selling the chilli oil!! Chilli oil here is very mandatory and never skip this on every meals here. Forbidden City is a proof that your restaurant doesn't have to be a gimmicky interior and striking sign to be a good restaurant. The name itself, the food, is enough reason to you why you should stop here and go home with the stuffed stomach. Very recommended. Abdul Razzaq I found the balance of flavour in all the dishes too much on the sweet side for me and the orange beef lacked a crispy batter. Helen Joe If you’re looking for an authentic halal Chinese restaurant with great food, large servings and quick service, this is the place to be. Bookings are recommended as they do get filled up some nights. I’ve been to many Chinese restaurants and this sits well on top of my list and the food is always consistent and service is quick no matter how busy they are. Eugene T Anyone who asks for the best Peking duck in Wellington, this is where you come! They have the best chef from Beijing and you get so much meat! You can choose "one way", 2 ways (Peking duck with noodle stir fry) or 3 ways (duck bone soup) basically just use the rest of the duck and not wasting them. We got the 3 ways and the soup is nice and refreshing, noodles we could live without but it's fine. Bonus is their cold dish mung bean noodles is the best I've ever had and love their stir fried eggplant with mince stuffing. Pei-Ying Pan PREV NEXT LOCATION × Average Customer Rating 4.3 A nice place in the lower hutt city to try out authentic Chinese food. Specially a halal menu. Can accommodate different group sizes. name: Food Trip Ltd
homepage_content: Food Trip Ltd | Matamata | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Food Trip Ltd PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Food Trip Ltd Order Online from Food Trip Ltd Filipino * 77 Broadway Matamata 3400 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Pork Bao Buns (2 Pcs) $11.20 Pan Fried Dumplings (10 Pcs) $15.70 TOP SELLERS Pork Bao Buns (2 Pcs) $11.20 Pan Fried Dumplings (10 Pcs) $15.70 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed 11am to 8pm Friday Closed 11am to 8pm Saturday Closed Closed Sunday Closed Closed Monday Closed Closed Tuesday Closed 11am to 8pm Wednesday Closed 11am to 8pm REVIEWS This was such a special place. The food was great, love me some Filipino food. My friends and I had a great experience eaten in also. Friendly and helpful staff. Took home some amazing ube cake. Would recommend, especially if you havent had Phillipino food before 🙌🏽 Jayden Fairbairn-Lowe (Jayden) Filipino vibes. We were hesitant at first as there were no customers. But the staff and owner is friendly. We had sisig, kare-kare, lumpia, pancit and 2 drinks (frappe and blue curacao). I just have one problem with the lumpia rolls, it was a bit bland without the sweet chili sauce. But everything was delicious! Different delicacies of Pinoy foods 🤤 We took home buco pie and puto, I can tell that the puto was days old. But buco pie was yummy! We hope to go back and explore Matamata again soon. It is worth a try if you are in the area and craving for Asian food. STP I am Filipino, and I can confidently say that the Filipino food at Food Trip tasted great! The service is warm and friendly. Would 100 percent go again, in fact we went twice during our stay at Matamata because it was just that good! Great services as well as plenty of staff around the restaurant for service. matt hk Second time to visit and will be coming back again soon! Photos are from both visits ☺️ ffa b Wasn't supposed to go to this place for lunch but we did anyways, and I was pleasantly surprised. The food is very good and the service fantastic. The servings generous to justify the price . ENKI'S FUN TECHNO STUFF (EnkiTrillionaire) My new fav yum char and i have been to loads of top ones in Auckland. Such great flavour, choose from menu and they cook to order so its super fresh and hot. Its in an old building with great views over the city. It's definitely a great spot for a bunch of people to yum char together. Mcenergy This restaurant truly impressed me with its **excellent value for money** and **generous portions**—a rare combination in today's dining scene. The **silky-smooth rice noodle rolls (cheung fun)** and **juicy, perfectly textured siu mai** are absolute highlights But the surprises don't stop there! Their **Peking duck two-way preparation** deserves special mention: **crispy skin** **succulent, flavorful meat**. The creative pairing with **stir-fried shredded duck and bean sprouts** adds wonderful texture contrast. Other standout dishes include: - **Yu Xiang eggplant clay pot**: A masterful balance of spicy, sweet and savory notes - **Seafood tofu hotpot**: Creamy tofu swimming in an umami-rich broth - **Golden-fried shrimp balls**: Crispy exterior giving way to bouncy, fresh shrimp filling What truly sets this establishment apart is its **skillful execution of both regional Chinese cuisines**—from Cantonese classics to Northern specialties. Every dish showcases **quality ingredients** and **traditional cooking techniques**, yet remains accessible through **reasonable pricing**. Perfect for family gatherings or casual dining, this is the kind of place that keeps you coming back to explore more of the menu. Already planning my next visit to try their other dim sum varieties! homepage_content: Golden Roast (Palmerson) | Palmerson North | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Golden Roast (Palmerson) PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Golden Roast (Palmerson) Order Online from Golden Roast (Palmerson) * 268 Cuba St Palmerson North 4410 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Pork Roast Meal $18.90 Potatoes $2.00 TOP SELLERS Pork Roast Meal $18.90 Potatoes $2.00 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup Thursday Closed Closed Friday Closed Closed Saturday Closed Closed Sunday Closed Closed Monday Closed Closed Tuesday Closed Closed Wednesday Closed Closed REVIEWS We have come here a few times. Always delicious and really good portions. Have dined in or takeaway and both had leftovers for the next day. Clean tidy and a spot to sit down. Roast pork with extra crackle is our go to. Always parking outside and the staff are very friendly. ashleigh young Good place to eat not to big so is nice, I got a large pork roast, it was very nice and the pork was nice and tender, but the pork could of done with more crackle put in because I love crackle, and it's had lots of vegetables, it come with potatoes, pumpkin, kumara, carrots, peas, and apple sauce and gravy, the large pork roast could feed 2 people, and it only cost $24.90 for large, so I think that good value, and they also have lamb, beef, chicken, corn beef, they also have good prices on heaps of other food items, and very friendly fast service, I would recommend place to anyone who likes nice food and a good roast like you would cook at home 😊 Damian (A1-BUYS) Yummmmmmmm!!! The food was soooo good. The meat was super moist and you get so much of it. The pork crackling was to die for, and definitely one of the best cracklings I’ve ever had. Great service, and really fast. Only waited 2 minutes after ordering and it was ready. Staff were friendly, and the price was great for how much you get. I’ll be definitely getting my roasts from here from now on. Destiny Moore Every visit is a lovely friendly welcome , gorgeous meat with amazing pork crackling our favourite roast place .Yum!!! Country Attire Vivamus sagittis lacus vel augue laoreet rutrum Shop Action Internet Fusion Group Limited, Internet Fusion Limited, Surfdome Shop Limited, Country Attire Limited, Country Attire Holdings Limited and Newtyle Trading Company Limited entered administration on 28 April 2023. Tony Wright and Alastair Massey of FRP Advisory Trading Limited were appointed to act as joint administrators. homepage_content: Get a Free Home Carpet Consult in Whanganui Today WINNER: Supreme Award. Franchise System of the Year 2025. 00 Days 00 Hrs 00 Min 00 Sec View Specials My Selection You have not added a product to your selection yet. Browse our range CLOSE Enquire now Flooring Curtains & Blinds Solar Own a Franchise Blog About Locations Contact Book now 0800 421 001 Book now I have been the owner/operator of Harrisons Carpet Manawatu since January 2005, when I left the comforts of an Accountancy office here in Palmerston North to spread my wings and buy my own "little" business. I soon became so busy in my own "little" business that I had to buy another van and start employing staff. I eventually sold a portion of the area I owned to serve my customers' expectations better. I look after half of Palmerston North with the surrounding areas of Feilding, Bulls, Sanson, Marton, the northern Manawatu district, and across some Whanganui areas. I'm sure you would have seen my distinctive sign written van zooming around the district. Both my partner Chris and I are very involved in the community and enjoy a stroll around the Palmerston North golf course together whenever we can. I support our local golf club by sponsoring an annual golf tournament known as the Harrisons Carpet Open Day, a very popular event.I believe my strength is listening to what my customers want and trying my best to deliver to their expectations so they can be delighted with their experience dealing with Harrisons. Get in touch with us today for an appointment, and remember - we come to you! Book a free consultation General enquiry Testimonials Here's what the locals had to say... Mary Sammons Whanganui Thanks for assisting us to get our lovely carpet supplied and beautifully installed. Perfect finishing to our home. Great value, plenty of product choice and excellent service. Michelle Brock Palmerston North Great service, Kaye and her team are always a pleasure to have in my home. I highly recommend them all :) Kathy Hardy Whanganui Great people ie Kaye, to deal with. Very prompt with appt. and with quote. Large selection of carpets to choose from and reasonable prices. The boys eg. carpet layers prompt in arriving and getting on with the job in hand, also very good with the vacuum cleaner lol. Carpet laid superbly with no hipcups and great music. Would throughly recommend Harrison's, Kaye and the boys (men). Tracey Greig Palmerston North Easy process. Kaye was amazing. Listened to what we needed and gave great advice. I would recommend her to everyone. C. Ancell Whanganui Excellent customer service calling in on me to check up on how I was feeling after the installation. I remain as happy, deep into the night, as I was when I last saw you. No reminder required for payment on remainder due. I am very fastidious in making sure payment for services rendered is expedited quickly and efficiently. Thank you again for an excellent product and an excellent service. I will spread the word far and wide. Nice doing business with you Pieter and Eliza Botha Manawatu Kaye has been very helpful, knowledgeable and supportive. It was a pleasure doing business with her. Ann Manley Palmerston North Great meeting with Kaye with her valuable knowledge and advise with assisting us with choosing our carpet. Now thatâs itâs been installed it makes our home warm and cosy.

name: Golden Time Restaurant
homepage_content: Golden Time Restaurant | Palmerston North | ORDER ONLINE | Takeaway | TuckerFox NZ Welcome to Golden Time Restaurant PRE ORDER ONLINE Welcome to Golden Time Restaurant Order Online from Golden Time Restaurant Asian & Chinese Cuisine * 649 Main St Palmerston North 4414 * Online Menu * Takeaway * Secure Online Payments * TOP SELLERS Sweet & Sour Pork 酸甜咕噜肉 $32.00 Combination Fried Rice 什锦炒饭 $22.00 TOP SELLERS Sweet & Sour Pork 酸甜咕噜肉 $32.00 Combination Fried Rice 什锦炒饭 $22.00 Menus PRE ORDER ONLINE Online Operating Hours Pickup LUNCH DINNER Thursday 11am to 2pm 5pm to 9pm Friday 11am to 2pm 5pm to 9pm Saturday 11am to 2pm 5pm to 9pm Sunday 11am to 2pm 5pm to 9pm Monday Closed 5pm to 9pm Tuesday 11am to 2pm 5pm to 9pm Wednesday 11am to 2pm 5pm to 9pm REVIEWS After a long absence, decided to have dinner with family there. Actually, it was a quick light lunch I had with 3 colleagues the previous month that I decided to come back for a full meal. The food was not only good but the portions were huge compared with other Chinese restaurants. We had lemon fish, sweet & sour pork, combination fried rice, combination vegetables & deep fried mushrooms. Added some Yum Char dishes as they were available; not just during lunch time. So good that I took 2 of my colleagues there for Yum Char the next day; which they thoroughly enjoyed. Not sure why they were not very busy like other Chinese restaurants that have Yum Char. Another pus for this restaurant is that there is no surcharge for paywave & I was able to use my credit card to earn airpoints. They also didn't charge for takeaway containers for our leftovers; again unlike the other restaurants. Will certainly be back again soon. Andy Andy Authentic Chinese food with generous portions! The dishes tasted just like back home, very flavorful and well-prepared. Portions are huge, two of us couldn’t finish and had to pack the leftovers, which was great for later. Highly recommend if you’re looking for real Chinese flavors and value for money. Hui Shan Tan My wife and I decided to eat here after hearing good reviews from friends. The food portions were huge, and everything was absolutely delicious. The highlight of the meal was definitely the Peking duck with pancakes. The service was perfect. The staff were very attentive and made sure all of the customers were well taken care of. Wiremu Wallace I could not recommend this place enough. The food is outstanding and the staff are more than 5 star. This is our new favorite place. We absolutely love everything about this restaurant and I know you will as well. Vegetarian options are available (pictured) but are not so obvious on the menu. We were seated quickly & our orders taken not long after. The food arrived promptly. I do feel like, as a non-Chinese person, you may struggle to communicate with the wait staff. If we didn't have someone with us to translate, I feel like it could have been problematic and our experience would have been different. I would go back with my Chinese friends. Bee You can't deny they have some most delicious Chinese style roasted ducks here. Very surprising to find this restaurant only obtained 3.9. I don't know what other people think, at least, it has been in the market for more than 2 decades, still strong as always, nothing impacted by the economy. Eric Chou奧克蘭寶哥 The food was as good as before. I haven’t been here in four years. They serve quite fast. The portions are big and the prices was good. They’ve had the same menu now for many years and a lot of people still come here for dinner/lunch. Its nice you get soup on the side with rice. And bean sprouts for your soup. There are also condiments on the side. I love adding chilly on my soup. Gives it a kick. The food quality is great, portions are generous, and the service is both efficient and quiet, and very quick! The restaurant is spacious, offering plenty of indoor seating. I've been in NZ for a bit more than 2 years, and I have to say, this is so far the best tasting chinese takeaway I've tried. My barometer is the Sweet n Sour pork. And while most takeaways have too much breading and no taste, this one has hefty meat pieces and so tasty! I would go here over Flavor House any day. Also, servings are huge for the price. Really good selection of all the Chinese dishes you're craving. Indoor tables and seating aren't flashy but perfectly functional. Best Chinese I've eaten in ages 😋 Ray C Very good takeaways. Had four dishes tonight, all tasty and with fresh vegetables. Can really recommend them. Tom Rosentreter Finally I've found a right place for to-go in the area. Chinese food with rich flavour, generous portion, fresh ingredients, good customer service, most affordable price, etc. A huge car park for free at the rear where is accessible next to KFC. Love spicy pork belly & chicken fried rice noodle most. Just hands down. You should try various kinds of authentic Chinese food, not just ordinary Chinese takeaway food. Dine-in available but not in a fancy setting. Thank you guys for making extra spicy as always. Sue K I love this Chinese takeout for their hot chips. Are always golden crispy and well drained. In my opinion they do the best chips out of our three local Chinese takeaway because of the golden crispy crunch the chips have. Smaller portioned but best quality. I also tried their spicy sliced pork belly on white rice with vegetables as it was a recommended dish under reviews on their website. Have tried the same dish at Mt Albert & Mt Eden. They do not compare to this place and the way they do it. My favourite dish is the Chicken Rice Noodles dish. It’s so satisfying as a comfort food. And the servings sizes of these two dishes are worth the price. The owners are friendly. I hope they will stay open for as long as I am here. The others just don’t seem to compare. Ngawai Davis I read about this place and was keen to try it out. I finally got to try it on the weekend and was not disappointed. I'm definitely coming back to try some of the other dishes and maybe get some hot chips from here. name: Holey Moley Golf Club Auckland
homepage_content: Mini Golf & Putt Putt Auckland | Holey Moley Holey Moley Golf Club Auckland Book Now 360 Venue Tour Get ready to kick putt! Imagine the craziest round of mini golf you’ve ever played. Now add a bar. Hello, Holey Moley Golf Club! homepage_content: Japanese Restaurant MOMIJI | takeaway | 26 Victoria Ave. Wanganui top of page Find Food OPENING HOURS ​ LUNCH ​ Tuesday -Sunday 11am-2pm DINNER Tuesday-Sunday 5-9pm (order stop 8.30pm) Sunday 5-8.30pm (order stop 8pm) ​ Closed Monday ​ ​ Online Order Tuesday-Saturday 11am-1.30pm 5-8.10pm Sunday 11am-1.30pm 5-7.40pm ​ ​ FIND FOOD JAPANESE BEER NEW ZEALAND WINE SASHIMI SUSHI JAPANESE SAKE STONE GRILL About us ​ ​ We are a Japanese owned fully licensed casual Japanese and Stone Grill restaurant. Located in the heart of Whanganui, in a historic building that used to be the Bank of New Zealand. The owner chef has over 20 years of experience as a chef both in Japan and NZ who provides traditional and sometimes his own creative sushi or other Japanese meals. The menu consists of Appetizers, Party platters, Bento boxes, Sushi, Sashimi, Tempura, Japanese Curry, Domburi bowls, Ramen and Udon. For the drinks, Japanese Beer & Sake, NZ Craft beers, NZ wines and RTD’s. ​ Please enjoy some genuine Japanese style meals and historical atmosphere. アンカー 1 bottom of page
